loans.name: Araba

texts.en:
Araba is a fishmonger. She buys fresh fish from the market and smokes them for sale.  Araba has been selling smoked fish for 15 years. She is married with four dependents. She uses her income to support her husband in the general upkeep of their family. 

Araba will use her loan to purchase fresh fish to smoke for sale. Araba will expand her business with the new profit.

loans.use: to purchase fresh fish to smoke for sale.

loans.name: Nana Aba

texts.en:
Nana Aba sells vegetables, like tomatoes, at Brenu – Akyinim, near Elmina. Nana Aba is divorced and has four children she is taking care of.  As a single parent, she uses her income to feed, clothe, and pay her children’s school fees.  She has been in the vegetable-selling business for four years.  

Her loan will be used to buy a variety of vegetables, like tomatoes, okro, peppers, and onions, to satisfy her customers. She hopes to use the new profit to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy a variety of vegetables, like tomatoes, okro, peppers, and onions, to satisfy her customers.

loans.name: Adjoa

texts.en: Adjoa lives together with her husband, who is a fisherman, and 3 children at Brenu–Akyinim, near Elmina. Adjoa sells fishing nets, thread and other materials for fishing, which she has done for 5 years. She uses her income to support her husband in paying for their children’s school fees. Adjoa will use her loan to purchase more fishing nets, thread and other materials to sell. With her new profits, she will expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more fishing nets, thread and other materials to sell.

loans.name: Maame

texts.en: Maame produces kenkey (fermented maize dough) for sale at Brenu-Akyinim, near Elimina. She is a single parent with 2 children. Maame has been selling kenkey for the past three years. As a single parent, she is responsible for the general upkeep of her children and so uses her income for that. Whatever she has left, she saves for the future and reinvests in her business. Her loan will be used to buy maize for the production of kenkey. She hopes to use the new profits to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy maize for the production of kenkey.

loans.name: Francisco Javier

texts.es: Francisco Javier tiene 47 años de edad,  él es trabajador activo de una empresa privada que brindan los servicios de Vigilantes, tiene tres hijos dos estudiando en secundaria y uno en la universidad con edades de 18, 17 y 14 años, que aún están a su cargo, el con su esposa han logrado con muchos esfuerzos poder salir adelante con sus hijos dándoles lo mejor han podido que son sus estudios, él tiene seis créditos con los cuales les ha cambiado la vida en su familia, porque ha logrado construir un cuarto ahora tiene más espacio en su hogar, una de sus metas es seguir trabajando y poder brindarles una mejor condición de vida y así mejorar su vivienda,  aunque con su salario no le ajusta para las mejoras que necesita realizar en su hogar, por lo tanto él está solicitando un financiamiento de crédito para la compra de materiales de construcción como cerámica, azulejos para un baño, zinc, cemento y otros.
texts.en: Francisco Javier is 47 years old and works as a guard for a private security firm.  He has three children, aged 18, 17 and 14.  Two are at high school and one is studying at university though he is still responsible for them.  Along with his wife, Francisco has put in a lot of effort for the family to do well and has given his children the best possible education.  Francisco has had six loans, with which he has changed his family's life.  He built a new room on his house, giving more space at home and one of his aims is to continue working so as to be able to provide better living conditions for his family and improve the home.  Because his salary is not enough for the home improvements, Francisco would like a loan to buy construction materials such as ceramic, bathroom tiles, zinc and cement, among other things.

loans.use: to do some home improvements, with ceramic and zinc, among other things.

loans.name: Esi

texts.en: Esi cooks banku for sale at Breanu-Akyinim, near Elmina . Banku is made from fermented maize or cassava dough. She is married and has 5 children. Her husband is a fisherman. Esi has been selling banku for 6 years. Her loan will be used to buy bags of maize for her banku. She hopes to use the new profits to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy bags of maize for her banku.

loans.name: Nana Ekua

texts.en:
Nana Ekua sells kenkey and farmed products at Brenu – Akyinim, near Elmina. Nana Ekua has received education through middle form four (middle school). She is a widow. Nana Ekua has been selling kenkey (boiled maize dough) and farmed products for 20 years. She is responsible for caring for her children and paying other household expenses. 

Nana Ekua's loan will be used to purchase bags of maize and other ingredients for the kenkey she sells. She hopes to use the new profits from her business to continue to expand her business and care for her family.

loans.use: to purchase bags of maize and other ingredients for the kenkey she sells.

loans.name: Esi

texts.en: Esi is a fishmonger in Brenu Akyimu, near Elmina. She is widow and has 3 children. Esi buys fresh fish and fries them to sell, which she has done for 30 years now. She uses her income to help pay her grandchildren's school fees. Her loan will be used to buy more fresh fish to fry and sell. She hopes to use her new profits to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more fresh fish to fry and sell.

loans.name: Ama

texts.en:
Ama is married and has six children. She has received schooling through Junior High School. Ama sells fried fish in Brenu Akyimu, near Elmina, which she has done for the past eight years. Her husband is a farmer. Ama uses her income to pay her children's school fees. 

Ama will use the loan to purchase fresh fish to fry for sale. With the new profits, Ama plans to continue to grow her business, so she can send all of her children to school.

loans.use: to purchase fresh fish to fry for sale.

loans.name: Aba

texts.en: Aba cooks rice and banku for sale. She serves it with fried fish and vegetable sauce at Brenu-Akyinim, near Elmina. She is married to a farmer and has 4 children. Aba has been in this business for 20 years now. She uses her income to support her husband for the general upkeep of their children. She will use her loan to purchase bags of maize and fish, which she uses in preparing her food for sale. She hopes to use the new profit from her expanded business to mount a better stall for the sale of her food.

loans.use: to purchase bags maize and fish, which she uses in preparing food to sell.

loans.name: Esi

texts.en:
Esi is married and has two children. She sells plastic bowls, cooking utensils and also bakes bread for sale in Brenu Akyimu near Elmina. She has been in this business for 3 years. She uses her income to support her husband to pay their children's school fees as well as all other expenses such as food, clothing and utility bills. 

Esi will use this loan to purchase more plastic bowls, cooking utensils for sale, eggs, sugar, and flour for baking. With the new profits from her expanded business, Esi plans to continue to support her family and herself.

loans.use: purchase more plastic bowls, cooking utensils for sale, eggs, sugar, and flour for baking

loans.name: Ama

texts.en:
Ama is widow and has three children. She is a farmer and a fish monger in Brenu Akyimu near Elmina. She has been in this business for the past 40 years. Ama uses her income to help pay her grandchildren's school fees as well as to take care of herself. 

Ama will use the loan to purchase more fresh  fish to smoke for sale. With the new profits, Ama plans to expand her business.

loans.use: purchase more fresh fish to smoke for sale

loans.name: Maame

texts.en: Maame is married and has two children. She has received schooling through Senior High School. Maame operates a provisions store and sells plantains, vegetables and other food items, in Brenu Akyimu, near Elmina, which she has done for the past three years. Her husband is a teacher. Maame uses her income to pay her children's school fees. Maame will use the loan to purchase a wider variety of provisions such as Milo, milk, vegetables and other food items. With the new profits, Maame plans to expand her business.

loans.use: purchase a wider variety of provisions such as Milo, milk, vegetables and other food items.

loans.name: Aba

texts.en: Aba is married and has three children. Aba is  a petty trader. She sells maize in Brenu Akyimu, near Elmina, which she has done for 12 years. Aba uses her income to pay her children's school fees, as well as all other household expenses, such as groceries and bills. Aba will use the loan to purchase bags of maize in large quantity, to resell. With the new profits, Aba plans to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase bags of maize in large quantity, to resell

loans.name: Agartha

texts.en: Agartha is a single parent. She lives together with her 2 children at Asebu, near Cape Coast. Agartha sells cosmetics, towels, sponges and other items. She has been selling cosmetics for 6 years. As a single parent, she uses her income to feed and clothe her children and pay for their school fees. Agartha  will use her loan to purchase more cosmetics, towels and sponges to sell. She hopes to use the new profits to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more cosmetics, towels and sponges to sell.

loans.name: Ernestine

texts.en: Ernestine operates a grocery store. This she has done for five years. The items in her grocery shop are milk, Milo, canned fish, canned tomatoes,  different kinds of drinks, biscuits, toffees, powdered milk and others. She is married to a farmer and has six dependents. Ernestine uses her income to support her husband, paying their children’s school fees. She will use her loan to purchase a greater variety of grocery items, to satisfy her customers. With the new profit, Ernestine plans to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase a greater variety of grocery items, to satisfy her customers.

loans.name: Charlotte

texts.en:
Charlotte sells charcoal at Asebu, near Cape Coast, which she has done for two years. She is married, her husband is a petty trader. She uses her income to support her husband in paying their accommodation bills.  

Charlotte will use her loan to purchase bags of charcoal to sell. With the new profit from her expanded business, Charlotte hopes to produce the charcoal she sells.

loans.use: to purchase bags of charcoal to sell.

loans.name: Ekua

texts.en: Ekua produces palm kernel oil for sale at Asebu, near Cape Coast, which she has done for  30 years now. Ekua is married and has 5 children. She uses her income to support her husband in feeding and clothing their children. Ekua will use her loan to purchase palm fruits and kernels to produce her palm  kernel oil for sale. With her new profits, Ekua will buy a machine to make her work easier and faster.

loans.use: to purchase palm fruit and kernels to produce her palm kennel oil to sell.

loans.name: Comfort

texts.en:
Comfort lives with her husband, who is a mechanic, and five children at Asebu, near Cape Coast. Comfort is a food vendor. She sells fried plantains, beans, and gari, which she has done for some years. She uses her income to assist her husband in the general upkeep of their home. 

Comfort will use her loan to purchase plantains and bags of gari and beans, to prepare her food for sale. With the new profit, she will expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase plantains and bags of gari and beans, to prepare her food for sale.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en: Mary operates a chop bar, where a variety of African dishes are sold. This she has done for four years. The foods she serves are fufu, banku and rice balls, with various sauces. She is married to a driver and has five children. Mary uses her income to support her husband, paying their children’s school fees. She will use her loan to purchase ingredients in larger quantity, for preparing foods for sale. With the new profit, Mary plans to acquire a better place for serving food to her customers

loans.use: to purchase ingredients in larger quantity, to use in preparing foods for sale.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en: Mary lives together with her husband, who is a farmer, and their eight dependents. She lives at Asebu, near Cape Coast. Mary sells saucepans and bowls, fried fish, and grain. She has done these activities for 10 years. She uses her income to assist her husband in the general upkeep of their family. Mary will use her loan to purchase a greater quantity of saucepans and bowls, and bags of grain, to sell, and fresh fish to fry and sell. With the new profit, she will expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more saucepans and bowls, and bags of grain, to sell, and fresh fish to fry and sell.

loans.name: El Progreso Group

texts.es:
El grupo el Progeso esta es su quinto ciclo, y trabajan juntas para poder salir adelante y ayudarse las unas a las otras. 11 son las mujeres que se unieron con el proposito de ayudarse las unas a las otras, para poder dar a sus familias todo lo que necesitan para una mejor vida.
Una de ellas es Maria, quien por medio de la venta de verduras ayuda a su familia, tiene todo tipo de verduras y horatlizaas, siempre tiene muy buena variedad y es lo que gusta a sus clientes.
Solicita de este crédito para poder surtirse y comprar verduras frescas para poder venderlos y seguir ofreciendo buenos productos a sus clientes.
texts.en:
The group Progeso (Progress) is in its fifth cycle. They work together to move forward and help each other. The 11 are all women that joined forces for the purpose of helping each other and to be able to give their families everything they need for a better life.

One of the women is Maria. Through the sale of vegetables, she helps her family. She has all kinds of vegetables and always has a good variety, which is what pleases her customers.

She is requesting a loan to be able to buy fresh vegetables to sell to supply her business, and to continue to offer good products to her customers.

loans.use: to buy vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Yvoty Group

texts.es:
En la Ciudad de Paraguarí, se reunieron un grupo de mujeres con el fin de formar un comité para poder ayudarse las unas a las otras. El comité lleva por nombre Yvoty, y quieren trabajar duro para ayudar a sus familias.
Todas las mujeres de este grupo son muy trabajadoras y emprendedoras, una de ellas es Blásida, quien se dedica a la venta de ropas. Blásida hace esto hace ya un tiempo, y está creciendo de a poquito gracias a su trabajo y a la ayuda a la ayuda de su grupo.
Solicita de este crédito para la compra de prendas de todo tipo para poder surtir su stock y seguir dando buena variedad a sus clientes.
texts.en:
In the city of Paraguari, a group of women got together with the hope to form a committee to help each other.  The committee's name is Yvoty, and they want to work hard to help their families.
All the women in this group are very hardworking and entreprenurial, one of them is Blasida, she works selling clothing.  Blasida has done this for some time now and is growing slowly thanks to her work and the help from her group.
She requests a loan to buy clothing  of all types to be able to stock her business and provide variety to her clients.

loans.use: to buy clothes for sale.

loans.name: Cecilia

texts.en: Cecilia cooks banku to sell, at Asebu, near Cape Coast. She serves her banku with sauce of fried fish and vegetables. Cecelia is married and has two children. She uses her income to assist her husband in the general upkeep of their household. Cecilia will use her loan to purchase maize for her banku, and fish and vegetables for her sauce. With the new profit, she wishes to establish a stall for the sale of her banku.

loans.use: to purchase maize for her banku, and fish and vegetables for her sauce.

loans.name: Gloria

texts.en:
Gloria is a seamstress. She also sells saucepans and African print cloth. She is married to a driver and has two children.  

Gloria has been in this business for eight years now. She uses her income to assist her husband to pay their utility bills.  

Gloria makes dresses for sale, so she needs the loan to purchase fabrics for the dresses she makes; also to purchase saucepans and African print cloth to enable her to increase sales. 

With the new profit, she will expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase fabrics for the dresses she makes; also to purchase saucepans and African print cloth to enable her to increase sales.

loans.name: Marcy

texts.en:
Marcy is 29 years old and lives in Kakata Town. She is single and has two children, ages 2 and 11, who are both in school and live at home. Marcy did not go to school. 

For the past five years, Marcy has been selling dried meat from a table in the market. She focuses on bush meat, and she is requesting a loan to buy more dried bush meat for her business. She established the business with a loan from her mother. A problem she faces is the distance to buy the dry meat at wholesale. 

Marcy enjoys the independence her income gives her. Her goal is to have a provision shop in the near future.

loans.use: to buy more dried bush meat for her business.

loans.name: Ama

texts.en: Ama is a petty trader, who sells hair extensions, dresses, and various food items at Abura. Ama  has received a Junior High School education. She has been in her business for the past three years. As part of her responsibilities, she helps in providing food for her family. Her loan will be used to purchase a variety of provisions, hair extensions, dresses and other items to resell. She hopes to use the new profits from her business to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of food items, hair extensions, dresses and other items to resell.

loans.name: Saydah

texts.en:
Saydah is 26 years old, single, and lives in Kakata Town, the capital city of Margibi County. She has two children, aged 1 and 7. Only one of them is in school, and both of them live at home. Saydah is a high school graduate.

For the past two years she has been selling used clothes, from a table in the market. She focuses on clothes for children. She is requesting a loan to buy more used clothes for her business. She established the business with a loan from her mother. She encounters few problems in her business, other than those times when her customers do not have enough money. She enjoys the independence her income gives her. Her plans are to build a shop and a house for her children.

loans.use: to buy more used clothes for her business.

loans.name: Fusena

texts.en: Fusena sells waakye, a dish made with local rice and beans. She serves it with gari, macaroni, meat, and fish stew. Fusena has been selling waakye for 10 years now. She is married, and her husband is a farmer. She uses her income to help her husband pay her utility bills. Fusena needs this loan to purchase bags of rice, beans, and other ingredients to prepare waakye to sell. With the new profit, Fusena will expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase bags of rice, beans, and other ingredients to prepare waakye to sell

loans.name: Patricia

texts.en:
Patricia lives together with her friend and two children in Kakata. Her children are 6 and 12, and only one of them attends school. Her husband is a carpenter, and he gave her the initial capital to start this business. She has had this business for the past five years. She sells dry fish at the community market. One difficulty she faces is the cost of transporting goods from Monrovia to Kakata. 

Patricia learned this way of selling from her aunt. She sells eleven hours a day, and makes profit when she sells. With her profits, she buys more goods and contributes to her family's expenses. She is requesting a loan to purchase more dry fish for her business. Her future plan is to educate her children.

loans.use: to purchase more dry fish for her business.

loans.name: Gaitav

texts.en: Gaitav is a 57-year-old woman. She lives with her husband and son in an apartment in Dornogovi province, Mongolia. Her husband Sharhuuhen is retired and stays home. He helps his wife with her retail clothing business. Her son Olziisuh, 27, works at their local fire department as a driver. Gaitav has been running her clothing business in the local market since 1998. She used the profits from her business to pay university tuition for her three younger children. Now they are all married and live separately. She is a hardworking and welcoming woman. She requests 3,000,000 MNT to allow her to import warm seasonal clothes to sell at her rental counter in the local market in order to increase her income.

loans.use: to import warm seasonal clothes to sell at the local market

loans.name: Evert Antonio

texts.es: Evert  Antonio  a sus 36 años de edad con dos hijos a su cargo uno de cuatro años y el otro de un año ambos menores de edad casado, del domicilio de Chinandega, tiene su negocio que es la compra y  venta de granos básicos: como frijoles, arroz, maíz entre otros productos, los cuales le compra a los agricultores de Chinandega, siempre se ha preocupado por brindar un buen servicio a sus clientes los cuales les distribuyes a comerciantes del mercado, pulpería y a otros clientes fijos. Ahora él está  solicitando un nuevo financiamiento  para la compra de granos básicos como: arroz, frijoles, aceite, azúcar, maíz, trigo entre otros productos.  Para así  ofrecer una mejor  variedad de productos a sus clientes.
texts.en: Evert Antonio is 36 years old and has two children to care for; one is four and the other is one year old.  He lives in Chinandega and has a business buying and selling basic grains such as beans, rice, corn, and other things which he buys in Chinandega.  He has always been concerned with providing good service to his customers who include merchants in the market, grocery store, and other steady customers.  He will use the money to buy basic grains such as rice, beans, cooking oil, sugar, corn, wheat, and other things.  In this way he can provide a better assortment for his customers.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Aba

texts.en: Aba  is a fishmonger; she buys fresh fish from the market and smokes it for sale.  Aba has been selling smoked fish for 10 years now. She is married with four dependents.  She uses her income to help her husband in the general upkeep of their family. Aba will use her loan to purchase fresh fish to smoke for sale.  Aba will expand her business with the new profit.

loans.use: to purchase fresh fish to smoke for sale

loans.name: Ama

texts.en: Ama  cooks  "banku"  for sale at Breanu – Akyinim near Elmina. 'Banku' is cooked and fermented maize or cassava dough. She is married and has four children. Her husband is a fisherman.  Ama has been selling 'banku' for six years. Her loan will be used to buy bags of maize. She hopes to use the new profits to continue to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy bags of maize

loans.name: Jannah

texts.en: Jannah is 31 years old and lives in Kakata Town. She is married and has four children between ages of 4 and 11 that are in school and live at home. For the past 10 years she has been selling rice, soap, candy, etc. Sometimes she has few customers, but most of the time she makes a lot of profit. She is requesting a loan to purchase more rice, soap, candy, etc. to expand her business inventory. In the future she hopes to expand her business into a big store.

loans.use: to purchase more rice, soap, candy, etc. to expand her business inventory.

loans.name: Eumelia

texts.es:
La Sra. Eumelia es casada con el Sr. Francisco hace varios años, tienen 2  hijos menores  que aún están cursando la escuela primaria, y por quienes ambos se esfuerzan para poder sacarlos adelante.
Eumelia; tiene una aguataría propia que había comprado con  mucho esfuerzo, Además de su trabajo, el Sr. Francisco trabaja como repartidor para ayudar a su señora con los gastos del hogar.Gracias al trabajo que están realizando educan a su hija, y compran todas las necesidades de su hogar.
Ella ha demostrado ser una persona muy responsable y honesta en sus compromisos. Comenta que gracias a su servicio brinda agua tratada a sus clientes.
Solicita este crédito para utilizarlo en la compra de bidones para utilizarlos en la repartición de agua. Agradece por la a oportunidad que está recibiendo, ya que le será de mucha ayuda.
texts.en:
Eumelia has been married to Francisco for several years, they have two young children who are still attending primary school, and for whom the couple work hard to get ahead in life. 

Eumelia runs her own water distribution firm, which she bought with a lot of hard work. In addition to his work, Francisco works as a deliveryman to help his wife with the household costs. It is thanks to the work they carry out that they can give their daughter an education, and buy all necessities for the home.

Eumelia has proven herself to be a very responsible and honest person in terms of her commitments. She comments that it is thanks to her service that she can provide her customers with treated water. Eumelia is seeking this loan to buy large water bottles to distribute water. She is grateful for the opportunity that she is being given as it will be of great use to her.

loans.use: to buy big water bottles to distribute water.

loans.name: Efua

texts.en: Efua is a fishmonger; she buys fresh fish from the market and smokes it for sale.  Efua  has been selling smoked fish for six years now. She is married with four dependents.  She uses her income to help her husband in the general upkeep of their family.  Efua will use her loan to purchase fresh fish to smoke for sale.  Efua will expand her business with the new profit.

loans.use: to purchase fresh fish to smoke for sale

loans.name: Adjoa

texts.en:
Adjoa sells 'waakye' (rice and beans cooked together). She serves it with 'gari' (cassava couscous), maccroni, meat and fish stew.  Adjoa has been selling 'waakye' for three years now.  She is married. Her husband is a driver.  She uses her income to help her husband to pay their accommodation bill.   

Adjoa  need this loan to purchase bags of rice, beans and other ingredients for the preparation of her 'waakye' for sale. With the new profit,  Adjoa will expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase bags of rice, beans and other ingredients for the preparation of her 'waakye'.

loans.name: Ganchimeg

texts.en:
Ganchimeg is a 34-year-old woman. She lives with her husband and two children in Ger in Darhan province, Mongolia. Her husband Lhagvasuren stays home to take care of their 2-year-old daughter Erhsaran. Her son Temuulen, 7, goes to a local primary school. Ganchimeg graduated from a university and started a retail clothing business in the local market. She stopped her business activities after giving birth to her son. Unfortunately, Ganchimeg's husband has an allergy, which prevented him from continuing to work at his old job. As a result of his health problem, he has been unable to get a new job for some time. 

Ganchimeg requests 6,000,000 MNT to relaunch her old retail clothing business in the local market. She has a broad network of suppliers and former customers. She is a hardworking, optimistic, and diligent woman.

loans.use: to relaunch her old retail clothing business in the local market

loans.name: Gantumur

texts.en:
Gantumur is 61 years old. He lives with his wife and youngest daughter in the Dornod province of Mongolia. His wife, Suren, helps him to run his own butcher shop business at a local market. His daughter, Batzolboo, age 24, goes to the university. 

For years, Gantumur had been working as an assistant worker of a butcher shop. After he retired, he started his own meat retailer and butcher shop business. His son has a truck and he buys cattle and other herds to let his parents, especially his mother, produce meat products, etc. 

Gantumur is now requesting MNT 3,000,000 to pay for his daughter's tuition fee and living expenses for the next semester. Gantumur's daughter, Batzolboo, is a hard-working and welcoming woman.

loans.use: to pay his daughter's university tuition and living expenses for the next semester.

loans.name: Julia Mercedes

texts.es: Julia Mercedes tiene 49 años de edad,  casada con cuatro hijos todos mayores de edad con edades de 28,27,25,22, anteriormente su  negocio consistía en la venta de granos básicos y de mercadería en general,  ahora  solo tiene negocio de mercadería en general en el cual consiste en la venta de productos como: ropa, cosméticos variados adornos de todo tamaño, ropa interior entre otros,  este negocio lo tiene desde hace 11 años, con poca mercadería principalmente con mercadería en general,  las compras por lo general las realiza en el mercado de mayoreo al contado, las vendes al contado y al crédito a clientes fijos, a clientes eventuales créditos que recupera cada quince días en el cual  ella misma se encarga de recoger, ahora nos está solicitando un nuevo financiamiento para el incremento de su negocio para la compra de variedades de  productos  y así brindar un mejor servicios a sus clientes.
texts.en: Julia Mercedes is 49 years old, married and has four adult children, ages 28, 27, 25, and 22.  Her business consists of selling basic grains and general merchandise that included: clothing, cosmetics, various decorations of all sizes, undergarments, and other things.  She has had this business for 11 years, started with only a few items, and makes her purchases in cash at the main market.  She sells for cash and credit to her steady customers and collects every two weeks.  She is asking for this loan to buy a variety of products and in this way provide better service to her clients.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Milagro Nazaret

texts.es: Milagro Nazaret, tiene 54 años de edad, casada cinco hijos mayores de edad 23,28, 34,36 y 38 años de edad, ella posee su propio negocio que es una bar y comedor  lo tiene ubicado en su casa de habitación en el municipio de Tonalá, Puerto Morazán  de la ciudad del Viejo, departamento de Chinandega, donde ella presta sus servicio de venta de comida, cervezas y gaseosas, a sus clientes  este negocio. Cuando inicia este negocio es con el objetivo de mejorar las los ingresos de  familia en los gastos. Una de las  metas que se puesto es de remodelar y mejorar las condiciones del rancho donde está ubicado su negocio.  La Sra. Milagro está solicitando financiamiento para invertir en el negocio para la compra en productos para el comedor.
texts.en: Milagro Nazaret is 54 years old, is married, and has five children ages 23, 28, 34, 36, and 38.  She has a pub located in her homein Tonala, Puerto Morazan in the City of del Viejo, within the Chinandega department.  There she serves food, beers, and soft drinks to her customers.  She began this business with the goal of increasing her income so that she could help with the family expenses.  One of her goals is to remodel and improve the conditions on the ranch where her business is located.  Milagro is asking for this loan to buy products for the dinner.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Koe Pyahu Group

texts.es:
El Comité Koê pyahu, se formo en el Barrio Ciudad Nueva de Caaguazú, actualmente estan en el Segundo, es un grupo conformado por señoras trabajadoras con ganas de salir  adelante, y esto es posible gracias al apoyo de la Fundación Paraguaya les brinda.
La Presidenta del Grupo es la Sra. Olga, ella se dedica por la mañana Limpiar una casa de familia y por las tardes vende bijouteries que lucha día a día para dar una vida digna a su familia tiene un hijo de 3 años, a la misma le ayuda su esposo que trabaja en una tapicería. Es una señora muy activa y responsable.
Solicita de este crédito para la compra de bijouterie para la venta, y así seguir ayudando a su esposo con los gastos del día a día.
texts.en:
The “Koê pyahu” Committee was formed in the Ciudad Nueva neighborhood of Caaguazú.  The group is in its second cycle and is made up of hardworking women with a desire to get ahead.  This has been possible thanks to support from Fundación Paraguaya.

Olga serves and the group’s president and works as a housekeeper in the mornings and sells costume jewelry in the evenings.  She works hard every day to provide a dignified life to her family; she has a three year old son.  Her husband works in an upholstery shop.  She is a very active and responsible lady.

[Olga] is asking for this loan to buy costume jewelry to sell and be able to continue helping her husband with the daily expenses.

loans.use: to buy jewelry.

loans.name: Mujeres Unidas Group

texts.es:
El Comité Mujeres Unidas, esta en Septimo ciclo,  Este grupo se formo con señoras con muchas ganas de seguir trabajando con la ayuda de la fundación,  las mismas tienen el deseo de invertir el crédito en su trabajo esto les facilitara con una herramienta para mejorar sus negocios.
La Presidenta es Graciela, una madre luchadora que tiene un pequeño negocio de consumo familiar y elaboración de panificados. Es muy Activa y responsable.  Gracias a su panadería está saliendo adelante y da a su familia lo que necesiten para tener una buena vida, ella quiere seguir trabajando y es por eso que se esfuerza mucho.
Solicita de este crédito para poder invertirlo en la compra de harina, levadura, sal, azúcar y demás insumos para poder seguir creciendo con su negocio.
texts.en:
The Committee of United Women is in its seventh cycle and is made up of ladies with a great desire to continue working with the foundation’s help.  They want to use the money from this loan as a tool to improve their businesses.

Graciela is a hardworking mother who has a small family food business and makes bread.  She is very active and responsible and, thanks to the bakery, she is getting ahead and is able to provid her family with what they need to have a good life.  She wants to continue working so she puts forth a great effort.

She is asking for this loan to buy flour, yeast, salt, sugar and other ingredients so that she can continue growing her business.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Denis

texts.es:
El señor Denis de 32 años de edad está casado hace 11 años  con la señora Alice de 30 años de edad, el matrimonio tiene dos hijos, uno de 11 y 2 años respectivamente.
El Sr. Denis se dedica a ser fletero y también a la compra y venta de aserrín desde hace 5 años, trabajo mucho tiempo en un colectivo que realizaba transporte por zona urbana de la ciudad, pero como ese negocio iba en decadencia vendió su colectivo y se dedica de lleno a este trabajo de fletero, también compra aserrín de la carpintería, aserraderos y luego los comercializa en las cerámicas de otras ciudades.                                                                         Solicita este préstamo para la compra de cubiertas nuevas y capital de trabajo con eso estará en buenas condiciones su vehículo que le asegura trabajar sin problema.
texts.en:
Denis is 32 years old and has been married to 30 year old Alice for 11 years.  They have two children, ages 11 and 2.

Denis is a driver for hire and also buys and sells sawdust and has done so for five years.  He worked a long time in a collective that provided transportation throughout the urban part of the city, but since that business was falling apart, he decided to sell his place and now does this full time on his own.  He also buys sawdust from the carpentry shop and then sells it to ceramic shops in other towns.  He is asking for this loan so that he can buy new utensils and to use as working capital so that he can keep his vehicle in good shape and work without any problems.

loans.use: to buy utensils.

loans.name: Virgen De Fatima Group

texts.es:
La Sra. Gloria es parte del grupo, ella es peluquera, tiene 40 años y está casada con el Sr. Gustavo, con quien tiene 3 hijos, ella es una persona muy trabajadora, quien se esfuerza por ayudar a su esposo y hacer así un poco más ligera la carga de la casa.
Su grupo se encuentra en el segundo ciclo y comenta la Sra. Gloria, que todas con mucho esfuerzo están saliendo adelante, ya que se ayudan y trabajan juntas para poder salir adelante.
La Sra Gloria  solicita el crédito para la compra de crema para cabellos, tintes,  Shampoo, enjuague, también de dedicara a ser manicura en su casa.
texts.en:
Gloria is a member of this group.  She is a hair stylist, is 40 years old, and married to Gustavo.  They have three children and she is a hardworking person who works hard to help her husband reduce the household burden.

Her group is in its second cycle and Gloria says that the members are getting ahead through their efforts and that they help each-other.

Gloria is asking for this loan to buy hair cream, tints, shampoo, and rinses.  She also does manicures from her home.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Albanio

texts.es:
El Sr. Albanio tiene 58 años, está casado con la Sra. Teodora. Ellos se dedican a la compra, envasado y venta de carbón vegetal. Inicialmente compraban los carbones envasados y solo lo vendían, actualmente lograron ampliar su depósito y pueden almacenar hasta 15.000 Kg. De carbón, compran las bolsitas de cartón y polietileno, las envasan y venden a pequeños comercios de la zona. Sus ventas la realizan en un carrito. Tienen una hija menor quien se encuentra en edad escolar.
Ellos  necesitan de este crédito para compra de carbón vegetal, pues están aumentando su clientela, por lo que también deben aumentar la cantidad de carbón envasado y cumplir con estos pedidos. Su mayor anhelo es poder brindar una buena educación a su hija, para poder garantizarle un futuro prospero.
texts.en:
Albanio is 58 years old and married to Teodora.  They buy, package, and sell hardwood charcoal.  At first they used to buy the charcoal already packaged, but they were able to expand their storage area and they can now store up to 15,000 kg of charcoal.  They buy bags and polyurethane, package the charcoal, and sell to small businesses in the zone.  They make their sales from a small cart.  They have a young school-aged daughter.

They need this loan to buy charcoal because they are increasing their number of customers and need to increase their amount of charcoal to meet their demands.  Their greatest desire it to provide an education for their daughter so that they can guarantee her a prosperous future.

loans.use: to buy charcoal.

loans.name: Mirtha

texts.es:
La Sra. Mirtha tiene 40 años, se dedica a confeccionar uniformes tales como conjuntos de buzos, Yumper, remeras, camisas, corbatas y otros  para distintas instituciones educativa para la zona de Ñemby, Ypane y Capiata.
Con este trabajo logro mejorar su vivienda y ayudarle al marido con el ingreso, ya que el solo no podía con todos los gastos, así que ella decidió ayudarlo, ya que la vida esta muy difícil. Hoy en día ambos se ayudan y están saliendo adelante.
Ella necesita de este crédito para la compra de telas para poder seguir trabajando y cumpliendo con los pedidos de sus clientes.
texts.en:
Mirtha is 40 years old and makes uniforms such as divers’ sets, jumper, t-shirts, shirts, ties, and other things for various educational institutions in the Ñemby, Ypane and Capiata zones.

She was able to improve her home through this work and also help her husband with the income, because he was not able to earn enough on his own.  She decided to help him because life is hard.  Now they help one another and they are getting ahead.

She needs this loan to buy fabric to be able to continue working and meeting her customer’s demands.

loans.use: to buy fabric.

loans.name: Claudia

texts.es:
La Srta. Claudia tiene 31 años, es soltera cuenta que termino sus estudios secundarios y se especializo en su profesión.
Ella se dedica a la costura actualmente cuenta con una boutique en el centro de la Ciudad. Sus mayores clientes son adolecentes, y le está yendo muy bien ya que siempre hace prendas que innovan y son muy solicitadas. Le gustaría para más adelante ampliar su local en un par de años y también seguir estudiando y formar una familia.
Solicita de este crédito para poder invertirlo en la compra de telas e hilos, ya que se acerca el año nuevo  y la navidad y es donde más ventas tiene y quiere poder seguir trabajando.
texts.en:
Claudia is 31 years old, single, completed middle school, and became specialized in her profession.

She sews and has a boutique in the center of town.  Her main customers are teen-agers and things are going very well for her because she always makes clothing that is innovative and well sought after.  She would like to be able to continue expanding her boutique and also continue with her studies and start a family.

She is asking for this loan so that she can invest in fabric and thread, now that Christmas and New Year are approaching.  She wants to be able to continue working.

loans.use: to buy fabric and thread.

loans.name: Wassa Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe Wassa, composé de femmes mariées et de veuves, ont en moyenne 44 ans, 5 enfants et vivent toutes dans des familles traditionnelles élargies dans la ville de Wakoro, Région de Koulikoro. 
Elles se sont connues à travers des liens de parenté, de voisinage et d’amitié. Elles font le commerce de la volaille, de condiments, du savon, des fruits et légumes.                                                                                                                          
Les femmes du groupe Wassa sont à leur quatrième prêt. 
La cliente NOUMOU, deuxième personne à partir de la gauche dans le rang des debout, compte acheter un sac d’igname et cinq paquets de vermicelle avec les revendeurs de Dioïla, ces produits sont préparés et vendus aux clients du village.
Elle envisage réaliser un bénéfice moyen mensuel de 30 000FCFA qui sera utilisé pour les besoins de la famille et une partie est réinvestie dans l’activité de restauration.
texts.en:
The group Wassa consists of women who are married and widows, are on average 44 years old with 5 children, and all live in extended traditional families in the town of Wakoro, region of Koulikoro.

They met through family, neighborhood and friendship ties. They sell poultry, condiments, soap, fruits and vegetables.

The women of the group Wassa are on their fourth loan.

The client Noumou, the second person from the left in the row of standing people, plans to buy one bag of yams and five packages of vermicelli from the resellers of Dioïla. These products are prepared and sold to clients in the town.

She envisions making an average monthly profit of 30,000 FCFA which will be used for the needs of her family and partly reinvested in her catering business.

loans.use: to buy foodstuffs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Sol Naciente Group

texts.es:
El presente comité se encuentra, en el ciclo 18. Podemos comentar la vida de la señora Basilia, quien tiene una despensa y allí trabaja todos los días desde muy tempranas horas del día.
Ella es una persona muy luchadora, que pese a los contratiempos que surgen día a día lucha por su familia y para poder darles todo lo que necesitan para ser personas de bien.
Solicita de este crédito para poder invertirlo en la compra de pollo, jamón y queso, huevo, choclo, de mandioca y bebidas, y demás insumos para poder tener bien surtido su negocio y seguir trabajando.
texts.en:
This Committee is in its 18th cycle.  We can talk about Basilia, who has a grocery store and works there from early morning daily. 

She is a hardworking woman who works hard for her family, given the daily challenges she faces, and wants to provide them with all they need so that the can be happy.

She is asking for this loan to invest in chicken, ham, cheese, eggs, corn, casaba, drinks, and other supplies to be able to have an assortment in her business and be able to continue working.

loans.use: to stock her store.

loans.name: Mujeres De Santo Tomas Group

texts.es:
Las 22 integrantes de este grupo son amigas y vecinas de la ciudad de Caacupé. Podemos hablar de la Sra. Gloria, quien es la tesorera del grupo, y ella tiene una despensa.
Gloria trabaja todos los días desde muy tempranas horas de la mañana y termina muy tarde en la noche. Ella es una persona muy trabajadora y comenta que gracias a la ayuda de su grupo y a los créditos de la fundación ha podido mejorar su trabajo e ir creciendo para poder ayudar a su familia.
Ella solicita de este crédito para poder usarlo en la compra de carnes, verduras, frutas, azúcar, etc. para cargar más su despensa y poder seguir creciendo.
texts.en:
The 22 members of this group are friends and neighbors from Caacupé.  We can talk about Gloria, who is the group’s treasurer and who has a grocery store.

Gloria works from early morning every day and finishes late in the evening.  She is a hardworking person and says that she has been able to improve and grow her business so that she could help her family, thanks to the loans through the foundation and support from the group.

She is asking for this loan so that she can buy meat, vegetables, fruits, sugar, etc. in order to stock her store and be able to continue growing.

loans.use: to stock her store.

loans.name: Laura

texts.es:
La señora Laura es de Santaní, se dedica hace más de dos años a la venta de ropas y accesorios femeninos y masculinos en un local alquilado.
Es cliente de la Fundación Paraguaya hace más de un año, ya que gracias a la ayuda que está recibiendo ha podido ir mejorando su negocio. Laura tiene como sueño poder tener algún día su propio local para poder tener mejores ingresos.
Solicita de este crédito para poder invertirlo en la compra de ropas para damas y también de accesorios para poder venderlos y seguir trabajando como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Laura is from Santaní and has been selling men’s and women’s clothing and accessories from a rented shop for two years.

She is a client of Fundación Paraguaya and has been for more than a year, thanks to the help she has been receiving, she has been able to improve her business.  Her dream is to be able to have her own shop someday, so that she can have a greater income.

She is asking for this loan to be able to buy women’s clothing and accessories so she can sell them and continue to work.

loans.use: to buy clothing for resale.

loans.name: San Miguel Group

texts.es:
El Comité de Mujeres de nombre Mujeres San Miguel, actualmente son 14 señoras quienes se encuentran trabajando muy a gusto en el 5º ciclo, han pasado muy bien los ciclos anteriores gracias al trabajo de cada una de ellas.
Adolfina, quien es parte de este grupo se dedica a la venta de Chipas (Alimento Típico paraguayo). Sus ventas cada vez van mejor ya que las chipas son consumidas en todo momento del año, tiene buena venta y cada vez está creciendo más. Ella se define a si misma como una persona muy trabajadora que desea salir adelante y crecer para ayudar a su familia.
Solicita de este crédito para poder invertirlo en la compra de chipas para poder venderlas y seguir trabajando.
texts.en:
This group of women called “Mujeres San Miguel” is made up of 14 working ladies and is in its fifth cycle.  They have had good luck with the previous cycles thanks to their hard work.

Adolfina is a member of this group and sells chipas (typical Paraguayan food).  Her sales continue to improve since chipas are eaten anytime during the year.  She has good sales and continues to grow.  She is known as being a hardworking woman who wants to get ahead and grow to help her family.

She is asking for this loan so she can invest in chipas to sell so she can keep working.

loans.use: to buy chipas.

loans.name: San Roque Group

texts.es:
El Comité San Roque, se conformo con la iniciativa de la Sra. Eva, quien es la presidenta, ya que ella se inspiro en ayudar a sus amigas y las unió y actualmente el grupo está conformado por 19 mujeres quienes se encuentran trabajando muy a gusto ya en el 8º ciclo.
La Sra. Eva se dedica a la venta de cosméticos, ella misma comenta que se encarga de elegir la buena calidad de sus cosméticos, y así ofrece un buen producto a sus clientas. Está saliendo adelante gracias a la ayuda de su grupo y a su esfuerzo. Solicita de este crédito para poder invertirlo en la compra de cosméticos de distintas marcas para poder seguir ofreciendo a sus clientas.
texts.en:
The San Roque committee began through Eva’s initiative.  She is the group’s president and was inspired to help her friends so she put this group together.  The group is made up of 19 ladies work together well and are in their 8th cycle.

Eva sells cosmetics and says that she selects good quality cosmetics so she can offer a good product to her customers.  She is getting ahead, thanks to her efforts and the help she gets from the group.  She is asking for this loan to buy different brands of cosmetics to be able to continue offering them to her customers.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics.

loans.name: Manuel De Jesus

texts.es: Manuel de 48 años de edad vive junto a su esposa y sus hijos, en casa propia. Gracias a Dios es un hombre que toda su vida ha sido trabajador y ha sido un buen padre ejemplar para sus hijos siendo un gran ejemplo para ellos. Manuel es responsable, atento, humilde pero con buenos deseos de superación su profesión es ganadera siendo esta una actividad económica que consiste en la crianza de animales para su aprovechamiento. Es así como día a día se gana la vida honradamente y nunca ha faltado el  pan en su hogar el desea comprar 3 novillos que son mejor conocidos por toros cuando aún tiene menos de tres años y así comenzar a comercializar lo que les dan es por eso que solicita a INTEGRAL un préstamos para la compra de estos novillos espera contar con la ayuda ya que ya casi no tienen animales y quiere seguirle brindando mejores condiciones de vida a su familia.
texts.en: Manuel is 48 years old and lives with his wife and children in their own home.  Thanks to God he is a man who has worked all of his life and who has been an exemplary father to his children and a grand example to all of them.  Manuel is responsible and humble but has a great desire to succeed in his business of raising animals.  This is how he earns an honest living and has always been able to provide for his family.  He wants to buy three steers, better known as bulls when they are younger than three years, so that can sell them.  He is asking for a loan through INTEGRAL to buy the steers.  He needs help because he doesn’t have many animals and he wants to provide better living conditions for his family.

loans.use: to buy steers.

loans.name: San Agustin Group

texts.es:
El comité San Agustin  se formó con la unión de varias vecinas de la ciudad de Mariano Roque Alonso. Todas las integrantes del comité desarrollan actividades independientes, pero también se ayudan para poder hacer actividades juntas para poder ayudarse las unas a las otras.
Una persona digna de destacar es Julia, quien por medio de zapatillas bordadas ayuda a su familia. Este es un trabajo que ella gusta mucho, ya que siempre tuvo mucha creatividad y lo muestra en cada una de las zapatillas que borda. Si bien es un trabajo muy sacrificado ella esta contenta con lo que hace y quiere poder seguir haciéndolo, es por eso que solicita de este crédito, para poder invertirlo en la compra de zapatillas, lentejuelas, hilos, agujas y demás, para poder seguir bordándolas y de esa forma poder seguir teniendo los medios para ayudar a su familia.
texts.en: San Agustín Group was founded by several neighbours of the town of Mariano Roque Alonso. All members have their own business, but they all help each other to do things together that benefit them as a group. One of the members, Julia, embroiders slippers to help her family with expenses. This is an activity she very much enjoys, since she gets to use her natural creativity, which shines through in each slipper she embroiders. While it is a very demanding job, she is very happy with what she does and wants to be able to keep doing it, which is why she asks for this loan in order to buy the necessary supplies for her trade: slippers, sequins, thread, needles, and others. Thanks to this loan, she will be able to keep working and helping her family.

loans.use: to buy slippers, sequins, thread, needles, and other supplies.

loans.name: Cristo Rey Group

texts.es:
El comité lleva por nombre Cristo Rey, son 14 mujeres que han asumido el compromiso de mantener unido el grupo y trabajar con respeto y ayudarse las unas a las otras. Actualmente se encuentran en el décimo primer ciclo y gracias al esfuerzo de cada una siguen creciendo.
Carolina, la presidenta del grupo, es una persona que desea salir adelante, es muy entusiasta y tiene muchas ideas para poder ayudar a sus amigas del grupo a salir adelante. Ella vende bebidas, y conforme pasa el tiempo va aumentando su clientela, le está yendo muy bien y con su esfuerzo está creciendo.
Solicita de este crédito para poder invertirlo en la compra de gaseosas, vinos, jugos, cervezas, etc., con los que podrá seguir dando buena calidad y variedad a sus clientes.
texts.en:
This group is called “Cristo Rey” and is made up of 14 ladies who have promised to keep the group together and work with mutual respect to help each other.  They are in their first cycle and continue to grow thanks to their efforts.

Carolina is the group’s president and she is a person who wants to get ahead.  She is very enthusiastic and has many ideas for helping her friends from the group to get ahead.  She sells drinks and her number of customers increase as time passes.  Things are going well for her because of her efforts and she is growing.

She is asking for this loan to buy soft drinks, wines, juices, beer, etc.  In this way she will be able to continue providing a variety of good quality products to her customers.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Aldo

texts.es:
El señor Aldo tiene 28 años de edad, es soltero y vive con su madre en la ciudad de Carapeguá. Desde muy temprana edad empezó a salir a vender las colchas que ellos mismos producen con su mamá y papá recorriendo muchas partes del país así como Asunción, Ciudad del Este y también en la ciudad argentina de Posadas. Después de varios años se independizó y empezó a trabajar por cuenta propia. Actualmente lleva  productos artesanales de la zona a venderlos por las ciudades cercanas de la capital,  transportándose en su motocicleta que gracias  a este trabajo logró comprar y también puede ayudar a sus padres económicamente.   
Solicita el préstamo para la compra de hamacas, frazadas y sábanas puesto que tiene muchos pedidos de estos productos y quiere venderlos.
texts.en:
Aldo is 28 years old, single, and lives with his mother in the city of Carapeguá.  From a young age he started going out to sell bedspreads that he and his mother and father made themselves.  They would travel through many parts of the country, such as Asunción, Ciudad del Este, and also in the city of Posadas in Argentina.  After several years he went out on his own.  Now he takes art products from his zone by motorcycle to sell in nearby cities.  Thanks to this work, he was able to buy the motorcycle and can help his parents financially.

He is asking for this loan to buy hammocks, blankets, and sheets because he has many orders for these items and wants to sell them.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Sagrada Familia Group

texts.es:
18 mujeres que desean salir adelante y progresar, se han unido para poder ayudarse las unas a las otras y por medio de su trabajo dar a sus familias todo lo que necesitan. Son mujeres jefas de familia que dan todo por sus hijos y familiares.
Maria es la presidenta, y ella por medio de la venta de comestibles ayuda a su familia, ella es una persona con gran espíritu de superación y lucha, ya que se día a día lucha por un mejor futuro, no solo para ella, sino también por el de su familia.
Solicita de este crédito para poder invertirlo en la compra de carne, verduras, condimentos, harina y demás insumos para seguir haciendo los comestibles que vende, ya que según comenta Maria tiene muy buena clientela pues sus comidas son muy ricas
texts.en:
18 women, who wish to get ahead in life and progress, have united in order to help one another and through their work provide their families all that they need.  As the heads of their families, these are women who give everything to their children and relatives.

Maria is the president, and she supports her family by selling food.  She is a person with great spirit to improve and work hard because she fights day to day for a better future, not only for herself but also for her family.

She asks for this loan to invest in the purchase of meat, vegetables, seasoning, flour, and other ingredients to continue making her food for sale. According to Maria, she has very good customers because her food is very delicious.

loans.use: to buy meat, vegetables, seasoning, flour, and more.

loans.name: Silvina

texts.es:
La Sra. Silvina gracias al préstamo anterior ha podido surtir su negocio y dar mejor atención y variedad a sus clientes. Comenta que la ayuda que Kiva y la fundación Paraguaya les ha dado le fue muy útil, no solo a ella sino también a sus hijos.
Ella solicita nuevamente un crédito para poder surtirse nuevamente con todo tipo de productos, como ser bebidas, verduras, carne, embutidos y demás y así seguir dando a sus clientes una buena variedad de productos.
texts.en:
Silvina, thanks to the previous loan, has been able to stock up her business and offer better attention and variety to her customers.  She says that the help  that Kiva and Foundation Paraguaya have given her has been very useful, not only to her but also to her children.

She asks for a new loan to be able to again stock up her store with all kinds of products like drinks, vegetables, meat, sausage, and more, and thus continue offering her customers a good variety of products.

loans.use: to buy drinks, vegetables, meat, sausage, and more.

loans.name: Nery

texts.es:
El señor Nery tiene 34 años de edad, es un señor muy trabajador, es soltero,  hace 10 años vive con sus hermanos en la ciudad de Coronel Oviedo, vino de la ciudad de Yataity, es el mayor de sus hermanos y vino a trabajar en Coronel Oviedo para mantener a su familia.
El señor Nery trabaja como electricista de automóvil. Comenta que su trabajo es muy sacrificado porque solo el trabajaba en la familia, ahora le llevo a uno de sus hermanos a trabajar con él y de esa forma se están ayudando.
Su sueño es comprar un local propio porque está en un lugar alquilado. Está muy contento por la oportunidad que le brinda la Fundación Paraguaya y Kiva.
Solicita de este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de cables, focos y fusibles con los que podrá seguir trabajando y dando una buena atención a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Señor Nery is 34 years old, a very hard-working man, single, and has lived for ten years with his brothers in the city of Coronel Oviedo.  He comes from the city of Yataity, is the oldest of his brothers, and goes to work in Coronel Oviedo in order to support his family.

Señor Nery works as an automobile electrician.  He says that his job is very demanding because he is the only one that works in the family.  Now he takes one of his brothers to work with him and in this way he is helping.

His dream is to buy his own shop because he now works in a rented place.  He is very pleased with the opportunity that Foundation Paraguaya and Kiva have offered him.  He asks for the loan in order to invest in the purchase of cables, bulbs, and fuses, with which he can continue working and offering better care to his customers.

loans.use: to buy cables, bulbs, and fuses.

loans.name: Tsetsegmaa

texts.en:
Mrs. Tsetsegmaa is 59 years old and lives with her husband in a small house in the Selenge province of Mongolia. Her husband, Sharhuu, age 70, is retired and helps his wife's business of producing and selling organic dairy products. Her children are married and live separately. She has been running her organic dairy products business since 1991. She has four cattle, two baby cows, and 62 sheep. She is now requesting 6,000,000 MNT to purchase forage and change her windows into vacuum-sealed ones in order to reduce heat loss. She is hardworking, honest and responsible.

The picture of the borrower was taken at her daughter's clothing business.

loans.use: To purchase forage and change her windows into vacuum-sealed ones in order to reduce heat loss

loans.name: Rahimakhan

texts.ru: Рахимахон 47 лет, замужем и имеет двоих детей, школьники. Начав свой бизнес в сельском хозяйстве более 10 лет назад практически с нуля, Рахимахон добилась хороших результатов. На сегодняшний день в ее хозяйстве 2 коровы, 6 голов овец. Ежемесячный доход от продажи скота и молока составляет в среднем 11,000 сом (KGS), что является хорошей поддержкой для семьи.Муж Рахимахон инвалид и получает пособие по инвалидности.  Рахимахон обратилась в компанию «Бай Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом сумме 25,000 сом для покупки скота.Она хочет приобрести 2 бычка и сено для откорма. Доходы от деятельности она планирует вложить в расширение и реконструкцию сарая для животных.  "Бай-Тушум и Партнеры" предоставляет кредиты по линии Кива для социально-уязвимых слоев населения.  "Бай-Тушум и Партнеры" – это надежный финансовый партнер, осуществляющий вклад в развитие экономики Кыргызской Республики путем предоставления доступных микрофинансовых услуг в сельской местности и городах, способствующих созданию рабочих мест и отвечающий интересам своих клиентов и инвесторов.
texts.en: Rahimakhan is 47 years old, married, and has two school-aged children.  More than ten years ago, she started an agricultural business from scratch.  Rahimakhan has achieved good results. Today, on her farm she has two cows and six sheep. Her monthly income from selling cattle and milk averages 11,000 som (KGS), which supports the family well.  Rahimakhan's husband is disabled and receives disability benefits. Rahimakhan approached Bai-Tushum and Partners for a loan in the amount of 25,000 KGS to buy cattle.  She wants to buy two bulls and hay for fattening them. She plans to invest her profits into expanding and renovating the barn for the animals.

loans.use: to purchase bulls

loans.name: Enhtsetseg

texts.en: Mrs. Enhtsetseg is 41 years old and lives with her husband and four sons in a small house in the Selenge province of Mongolia. Her husband, Tor, age 41, helps his wife's business of selling clothes at the local market. Her sons, Barsbold, age 22, and Bold-Erdene, age 19, are university students. Her younger son, Erdenebat, age 13, goes to a local school, and her youngest son, Batmend, age 2, goes to a local kindergarten. She has been running her clothes-selling business in a rental stall of a local market since 2005. She imports clothes from a boarder city of Russia and sells them at the local market. She has built a strong supplier and customer base. She is now requesting 5,000,000 MNT to change her house windows into vacuum-sealed ones and install a new heating system since their house was built years ago and needs the renovation to reduce heat loss and stay warm during the winter. She is a hardworking, responsible and well-organized woman.

loans.use: To change her house windows into vacuum-sealed ones and install a new heating system

loans.name: Odinashoh

texts.ru:
Одинашох житель района Бохтар. Он женатый 45 - летний мужчина. Одинашох является отцом троих детей. Жена Одинашоха домохозяйка. Одинашох занимается растениеводством. У него при доме имеется небольшой участок земли, где он выращивает овощи. Этим видом деятельности Одинашох занимается два года. Он берет кредит для приобретения легкового автомобиля для своего сына, чтобы он смог начать свою деятельность, чтобы занялся частным извозом. Также чтобы он предоставлял услугу тем жителям, которые живут в отдаленных районах. 
Благодарю всех заранее!
texts.en: Odinashoh lives in Bohtar. He is 45 years old, married, and the father of three children. Odinashoh's wife is a housewife. Odinashoh is a farmer. He has a small plot of land at home where he grows vegetables. Odinashoh has been doing this for two years. He is taking out a loan to buy a car for his son, so he can begin working as a cab driver. Also, his son will be able to provide service to people living in remote areas. Thank you all in advance!

loans.use: buy a car for his son, so he can begin working as a cab driver.

loans.name: Erdenetsogt

texts.en: Erdenetsogt is 22 years old and lives with his wife and son in a ger in Dornogovi Province, Mongolia. His wife Ochir, 21, stays home taking care of their newborn baby boy, Onobayar, who is 6 months old. He has been working as an assistant worker in an automobile repair center for years and he has obtained a lot of experience and the trust of a lot of customers over the years. He is now planning to start his own small vehicle repair business in a rental place closer the province's population center. He is requesting 1,500,000 MNT to purchase some equipment and tools to start his own business. He will use his new profits to pay for the needs of his expanding family. He is a hardworking, diligent and active person.

loans.use: to purchase some equipment and tools to start his own automobile repair business.

loans.name: Kelsin

texts.ru: Келсин 49 лет, замужем, заботится о своей семье и больной матери. Келсин в качестве основного источника дохода для своей семьи, с 2002 года занимается полеводством, начав этот бизнес с суммы 45,000 сом (KGS). На сегодня в хозяйстве Келсин имеется 1,80 га земли, где она выращивает фасоль и свеклу. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Келсин обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 130,000 сом (KGS) на покупку минеральных удобрения и ядохимикаты. Доходы от кредита Келсин планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение бизнеса и улучшения благосостояния семьи, путем ремонта дома.
texts.en: Kelsin is 49 years old, married, and cares for her family and ailing mother. Kelsin's work is her family's main source of income.  She has been farming since 2002.  She started this business with 45,000 som (KGS). Today, Kelsin's farm has 1.80 hectares of land where she grows beans and beets. In order to further develop her business, Kelsin approached Bai Tushum and Partners for a loan in the amount of 130,000 som (KGS) to buy fertilizer and pesticides. Kelsin plans to invest income from loan into the business and to improve her family's standard of living by renovating their home.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer

loans.name: Naranzul

texts.en: Mrs. Naranzul is 32 years old and lives with her husband and two daughters in Ger in the Uvs province of Mongolia. Her husband, Damiran, runs a taxi service business within the area. Her two daughters, Altantsetseg and Altanchimeg, go to the local kindergarten. She gave birth to her youngest daughter and stayed home, until now, taking care of her two daughters. Her youngest daughter has just started going to kindergarten and Naranzul is now planning to start her own business as a cobbler in her home. She had been working as cobbler for years, before she gave birth, and she knows everything about it. She is now requesting 2'500'000MNT to purchase starting inventory for her cobbler business. She is a hardworking, friendly and diligent woman.

loans.use: to purchase starting inventory for her cobbler business.

loans.name: Ainura

texts.ru: Айнуре 38 лет, замужем, воспитывает 5 детей. В качестве источника дохода для семьи, 14 лет назад Айнура начала заниматься животноводством. Начатое с покупки 1 телки хозяйство на сегодня насчитывает 2 коровы и 1 теленок, что позволяет иметь прибыль в сумме 10,000 сом (KGS) с продажи молока и молочных продуктов. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Айнура обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 70,000 сом (KGS) на покупку дополнительных голов скота. Доходы Айнура планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение своего хозяйства и сделать дома капитальный ремонт
texts.en: Ainura is 38 years old, married, and has five children. Fourteen years ago, Ainura began working in animal husbandry to provide additional income to her family. She started by buying one heifer, and today her farm has two cows and one calf.  It produces an income of 10,000 som (KGS) from the sale of milk and dairy products. In order to further develop her business, Ainura turned to Bai-Tushum and Partners for a loan of  70,000 som (KGS) to purchase additional cattle. Ainura plans to invest her profits back into her farm and into renovating her home.

loans.use: to purchase a milk cow

loans.name: Gulayim

texts.ru: Гулаим 41 год, замужем. В 10 лет назад в поисках источника финансирования своей семьи, Гулаим начала свой бизнес в разведении скота. Использовав стартовую сумму в 10,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота, Гулаим сумела развить свое хозяйство, с ежемесячной прибылью в сумме около 6,000 сом (KGS). Дополнительным источником дохода является оказание услуг парикмахера местному населению. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Гулаим обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 70,000 сом (KGS) на покупку дойной коровы и теленка. В ближайшее время, при помощи доходов от кредита, Гулаим планирует увеличивать поголовье скота.
texts.en: Gulayim is 41 years old and married. Ten years ago, she was looking for a way to support her family and so began her cattle breeding business. Using 10,000 som (KGS) as starting capital to buy cattle, Gulayim was able to start her farm, which produces a monthly income of about 6,000 som (KGS). She makes additional income working as a hairdresser. In order to further develop her business, Gulayim turned to Bai-Tushum and Partners for a loan of 70,000 som (KGS) to buy cows and calves. With the profit she makes from this loan, Gulayim plans to increase her livestock in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase cattle.

loans.name: Gulshair

texts.ru: Гулшайыр 30 лет, замужем, мать 3 детей. У Гулшайыр средне образование. Характер у заявителя трудолюбивый и целеустремленный, предприимчивый и перспективный. Главной ценностью жизни считает своих детей. На сегодня в хозяйстве Гулшайыр имеется 0,4 га, где она выращивает эспарцет. В животноводстве она добилась того, что у нее в хозяйстве имеется 1 коровы. Животноводством начала заниматься 1999 году начальный капитал был в размара 3,000 KGS сом купив одного теленка. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса за счет животноводства, Гулшайыр обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 60,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота. Доходы Гулшайыр планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение хозяйства и планирует сделать капитальный ремонт в доме.
texts.en: Gulshair is 30 years old, married, and has 3 children. Gulshair has a secondary education. The applicant is hardworking, dedicated, enterprising and forward-looking. She considers her children the most important thing in her life.  Currently, Gulshair's farm has 0.4 hectares where she grows sainfoin. She has made certain that her farm has a cow.  She started practicing animal husbandry in 1999 when she bought a calf with start-up capital of 3,000 KGS. In order to further develop her business through livestock purchases,  Gulshair asked the company Bai-Tushum and Partners for a loan of 60,000 som (KGS) to buy cattle. Gulshair plans to invest her profit in her farm and plans to make major repairs to the house.

loans.use: to purchase milk cows

loans.name: Rahim

texts.ru: Рахим житель района А. Джоми. Ему 74 года. Он женат. У него пятеро детей. Рахим на протяжении тридцати лет зарабатывает путем разведения крупнорогатого скота. Своим трудом и упорством он смог обеспечить семью и воспитать пятерых детей. На сегодняшний день у него имеется одна корова и два теленка. Рахим намерен увеличить поголовья скота. Он берет кредит для закупа бычков и одной дойной коровы.
texts.en: Rahim lives in Jomi.  He is 74 years old, married, and has five children. Rahim has been breeding cattle for thirty years. Through his work and perseverance, he has been able to provide for his family and raise five children. Currently, he has one cow and two calves. Rahim plans to increase his livestock. He is taking out a loan to buy calves and a dairy cow.

loans.use: to buy calves and a dairy cow.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy tools he needs.

loans.name: Sumbula

texts.ru: Сумбула жительница района А. Джоми. Ей 42 года. Она замужем. Сумбула является матерью троих детей. Образование у нее среднее. Сумбула занимается животноводством. Она разводит крупнорогатый скот у себя дома. Этим видом деятельности Сумбула занимается пятнадцать лет. Она берет кредит для закупа бычков.
texts.en: Sumbula lives in A. Jomi. She is 42 years old, married, and the mother of three children. She has a high school education. Sumbula works in animal husbandry. She breeds cattle. She has been doing it for fifteen years. She is taking out a loan to buy calves.

loans.use: to buy calves

loans.name: Suyumkan

texts.ru: Суйумкан 54 года, замужем, имеет 3 детей и внучка 8 лет. В качестве источника дохода для семьи, Суйумкан занимается животноводством. Начатое в 1976 году с 1,000 сом хозяйство на сегодня приносит около 12,000 сом (KGS) в месяц. На данный момент в хозяйстве Суйумкан имеется 3 бычка. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Суйумкан обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку бычков и овец. Доходы Суйумкан планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение поголовья скота. В будущем она планирует в купить участок.
texts.en: Suyumkan is 54 years old, married, has three children and an eight-year-old granddaughter. Suyumkan began working in animal husbandry as a source of income for her family.  She began in 1976 with start-up money of 1,000 KGS, and now makes about 12,000 som (KGS) per month. Currently, there are three bulls on the farm.  In order to further develop the business, Suyumkan approached Bai-Tushum and Partners for a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) to buy bulls and sheep. Suyumkan plans to invest the profit in increasing her livestock. In the future, she plans to buy a plot of land.

loans.use: to purchase three calves

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy vegetables for vegetable selling business

loans.name: Bahodur

texts.ru: Баходур проживает в городе Истаравшан. Ему 36 лет. Он холост. Баходур живет с родителями. Его родители пенсионеры. Баходур занимается животноводством. Он зарабатывает путем разведения крупнорогатого скота. В этой области Баходур пять лет. Он берет кредит для закупа теленка и овец.
texts.en: Bahodur lives in the city of Istaravshan. He is 36, and lives with his parents who are pensioners. He works in the area of animal husbandry. He earns a living by raising cattle, and has been doing this for the last 5 years. Bahodur is now seeking a loan to by a calf and some sheep.

loans.use: to buy a calf and sheep

loans.name: Saodat

texts.ru:
Саодат мудрая и толерантная женщина. Она «очаг дома», которая посвятила всю свою жизнь для своей семьи. Она замужем на хорошего человека, которого зовут Хабибулло. Ее муж таксист и ели-ели справляется с обеспечением семьи. У Саодата 3 детей. Год за годом дети растут и требуют все больше благ. Детям надо поступить в университет, а также надо их женить и создать для них капитал. 
С целью получения дохода, Саодат хочет организовать свой бизнес. С такой целью она обучилась в курсе «Добейся успеха» организованный Ассоциация Деловых Женщин и получила сертификат. Теперь она вполне может организовать свой бизнес и стать успешной в этой сфере. Она хочет организовать бизнес переработкой и продажей молочных продуктов. Для этого ей необходимо купить корову и сепаратор. С молока она будет снимать сливки, а молоко квасить кефир. Полученную продукцию она будет продавать на местном рынке. Она запрашивает займ на сумму  5000 сомони для покупки коровы и сепаратор, чтобы организовать новый бизнес. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Saodat is a wise and tolerant woman. She is the hearth of home who dedicated all her life to her family. She is married to a good man who's name is Khabibullo. Her husband is a taxi driver and can barely provide for their family. Saodat has three children. They are growing up year after year and demand even more benefits. Her children need to enroll in a university and also have to get married and need to have some starting capital.

Saodat wants to start her business with a goal to receive more income. With this purpose she has studied and taken a course at the Achieve Success organized by the Association of Business Women and has received a certificate. Now she can start her business and become successful in this field. She wants to start a business processing and selling dairy products. Saodat needs to buy a cow and a separator. She will separate the milk from the cream and make milk into buttermilk. She will sell the received product on the local market. Saodat is asking for a loan in the amount of 5,000 somoni to buy a cow and separator to start her new business. She is awaiting your kindness.

loans.use: to buy cow and separator to set up new business.

loans.name: Umida

texts.ru: Женщина с «золотыми руками», которая живет на севере Таджикистана, имеет очень большой план в сфере бизнеса. Ее зовут Умида. Ей 24 года. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 2 детей. Ее муж фермер и получает маленький доход. Его доход не хватает для обеспечения семьи со всеми необходимыми средствами.  Так как Умида швея и умеет шить национальные женские платья и национальный матрас «курпача», она решила помочь мужу для благо получения семьи своим ремеслом. Раньше она не имела знаний о бизнесе. Недавно ее подруга сообщила ей о курсе «Добейся успеха» организованный Ассоциация Деловых Женщин, где обучают женщин создать бизнес-план и организовать бизнес. Она участвовала на этом курсе и получила сертификат. Теперь она вполне может организовать свой бизнес и стать успешной в этой сфере. Она хочет организовать бизнес шитьем национального матраса «курпача», так как имеет опыт в этом виде бизнеса. От полученного дохода она планирует обеспечить своих детей с хорошим образованием и высококалорийными продуктами питания. Она запрашивает займ для покупки швейной машинки, чтобы организовать новый бизнес. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
This woman, who has gifted fingers, lives in northern Tajikistan and has a very big plan for her business.  Her name is Umida and she is 24 years old, married, and she has two children.  Her husband is a farmer and earns a very small income that isn't enough to provide the family with all the necessities.  Since Umida is a seamstress and knows how to sew traditional women's dresses and traditional
futon-like mattresses called a "kurpacha," she decided to use her craft to help her husband with the family's well-being. 

She used to not have any knowledge about business.  But not long ago, a friend of hers told her about a course called "Attain Success" put on by the Associaiton for Business Women, where women learn how to write a business plan and start a business.   Umida studied in the course and received a graduation certificate.  Now she is fully able to start her own business and to be successful in it.
