Gerardo is 28 years old. He lives in his own home with his wife and daughter. He has been dedicated to agriculture for many years. Each year he sows the basics like corn, beans and sorghum. He repeats this year after year and it is his main source of income. This is how he earns a living and supports his family.

His dream is to improve his quality of life and that of his family, since they live in very poor conditions and he wants to give them something different. This motivates him to work with more enthusiasm since it is the only way to give his family what they desire.

For these reasons, he decided to go to the institution, INTEGRAL, to request a loan. It will allow him to invest in agricultural supplies like seeds, fertilizers, insecticides and others. He feels that they are necessary to cultivate the land, and to continue supporting his family. He hopes to achieve his goal of giving his family the better quality of life that they deserve.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, insecticides, and other supplies.

loans.name: Angel Leonel

texts.es: Ángel de 36 años de edad y habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su familia.  Ángel  se dedica al cultivo de granos básicos como: maíz, frijoles siendo esta  su principal fuente de ingresos, Ha realizado esta actividad por mucho tiempo y es así como se gana la vida honradamente. Él es un hombre muy responsable, honesto y dedicado en su trabajo. Es muy conocido por sus vecinos los cuales dan buenas referencias de su trabajo como de su persona. Cada año repite está actividad ya que es una persona muy humilde y de escasos recursos el cual no puede tener   otro tipo de negocio o trabajo. Este año al igual que los anteriores ha decidido cultivar la tierra y ya que la temporada de siembra está cerca él quiere estar preparado con los  insumos agrícolas necesarios  para cosechar los principales granos básicos. Esta es la razón por la cual solicita este crédito a esta institución, INTEGRAL, ya que no cuenta con los recursos económicos necesarios  para realizar la inversión. El crédito lo invertirá en la compra de insumos agrícolas como: semillas, abonos, insecticidas,  etc. De esta forma espera lograr cultivar los principales granos básicos de este año para poder llevar el pan de cada día a su familia.
texts.en: Angel is 36 years old and lives in a home of his own with his wife.  Angel grows basic grains such as corn and beans and this is his main source of income.  He has done this for a long time and this is how he earns an honest living.  He is a responsible, honest man, dedicated to his work.  He is well known by his neighbors, who provide him with good work and personal references.  He does this every year, is humble and of limited resources and not able to have another type of work or business.  This year, as in the past, he decided to cultivate the land now that the planting season is approaching.  He wants to be prepared with the necessary farming supplies so he can grow the basic grains.  He has requested this loan through INTEGRAL because he doesn’t have the financial resources he needs to make this investment.  He will use the money from this loan to buy farming supplies, such as seeds, fertilizers, insecticides, etc.  In this way he can grow this year’s basic grains so he can provide his family with their daily bread.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies.

loans.name: Cidha De La Cruz

texts.es: Cidha de 42 años de edad habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su esposo y su hijo. Ella se dedica  a la agricultura de los principales granos básicos como son: maíz y frijol. Después de sacar la cosecha  comercializa una parte de su cultivo para poder suplir las necesidades de su hogar que cada día son mayores. Ella es una mujer muy emprendedora y admirable lo más importante en la vida es ganarse el pan de cada día dignamente con el trabajo de sus manos además posee un pequeño chalet ubicado en una escuela. Ha trabajado toda su vida en la agricultura y es así como ha logrado sobrevivir, puesto que no cuenta con otra fuente de ingresos diferente a la agricultura. Como toda mujer emprendedora y visionaria ha tomado la decisión de acercarse a esta institución ya que la fecha para empezar las siembras se aproximan y quiere estar preparada.  Es por esta razón que solicita este préstamo a INTEGRAL para invertir en la compra de los insumos agrícolas como: semillas, insecticidas, abonos u  otros. Para comenzar la siembra lo más antes posible y poder cosechar los frutos de su esfuerzo. Confía plenamente que obtendrá una cosecha abundante la cual la cual le permitirá mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Cidha is 42 years old and lives with her husband and son in a home of her own.  She is a farmer and raises the basic grains, corn and beans.  After the harvest, she sells part of it and uses the other part to supply her household needs which are constantly increasing.  She is a very enterprising and admirable lady who’s most important goal in life is to earn her daily bread with dignity and by her own hand.  She also has a small stand located within a school.  She has worked in agriculture all her life and this is how she manages to survive, as she doesn’t have another source of income.

Like a visionary and enterprising woman, she decided to approach this institution now that planting season is approaching and she wants to be prepared.  For this reason she is requesting a loan through INTEGRAL, so that she can invest in supplies such as seeds, insecticides, fertilizer, and others so that she can harvest as soon as possible and enjoy the fruits of her labor.  She is confident that she will have an abundant harvest that will allow her to improve her family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies.

loans.name: Andres Cecilio

texts.es: Andrés de 34 años de edad vive junto  a su familia su esposa y sus hijos. Es un hombre visionario que siempre se ha caracterizado por ser un hijo, un padre y esposo ejemplar  que sus deseos de superación siempre han sido altos, siendo responsable, honesto, humilde, trabajador y muy emprendedor. Se dedica al cultivo de la sandía y esta es su principal fuente de ingreso desde hace varios años se ha dedicado a esta actividad y lo hace con esfuerzo y dedicación. Andrés desea comprar insumos para seguir comercializando sus sandias y que no se le arruinen por no tener lo necesario para cultivarlos es por eso que ha tomado la iniciativa de acercarse a INTEGRAL  para solicitar un crédito y comprar insumos como: Abonos, Fertilizantes, Pesticidas u otros. Espera que la ayuda que solicita se le sea dada ya que cuenta con buenas referencias de pagos y espera saldar la deuda antes de lo previsto.
texts.en: Andrés is 34 years old and lives with his family; his wife and children.  He is a visionary man, always known for being a good son, father, and husband.  He’s an example because his desire to get ahead has always been high and he is very responsible, honest and enterprising.  He is a farmer and has done this with lots of hard work and dedication.  Andres wants to buy supplies so that he can continue selling his watermelons.  He does not want them to be ruined because he does not have what he needs to raise them, so he has approached INTEGRAL to request a loan.  He will use the money to buy fertilizers, pesticides, and other things.  He hopes that he will get the assistance he is requesting.  He comes with good credit references and expects to be able to pay off the loan ahead of schedule.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies.

loans.name: Venancio Neftali

texts.es: Venancio de 38 años de edad vive junto a su familia su esposa y sus hijos. Es un hombre y trabajador, honesto que con tal que su familia tenga lo mejor hace hasta lo imposible por brindarles un buen futuro y que en su hogar no falte el pan de cada día. Venancio es muy conocido por los vecinos por ser colaborador y amigable ya que siempre cuanta con habilidades y esto lo hace ser un buen hombre. Venancio es agricultor es así como se gana la vida honradamente con, El cliente desea mejorar un poco su vivienda ya que con esfuerzo y dedicación la ha ido construyendo pero ya no tienen los recursos necesarios y quiere mejorarla.Pero esto lo lograra solo teniendo las mejores cosechas. Es por eso que solicita a INTEGRAL un préstamo para la compra de insumos agricolas como: semillas, abonos, fertilizantes, entre otros.  Espera contar con la ayuda y mejorar su vivienda ya que su mayor sueño es tenerla bien bonita, pintada, agradece a Dios por la oportunidad que le da y porque nunca lo ha dejado solo a él ni a su familia.
texts.en:
Venancio is 38 years old and lives with his family; his wife and children.  He is a hardworking, honest man who does the seemingly impossible so that he can provide a good future for his family and so that they are not in need of their daily bread.  Venancio is very well known by his neighbors as being cooperating and friendly with many talents.  This makes him a good man.

Venancio is a farmer and he earns an honest living in this manner.  He wants to make some improvements to his house, which he built with great effort and dedication, but doesn’t have the resources he needs.  He wants to acquire them through better harvests.  He is asking INTEGRAL for a loan to buy supplies such as seeds, compost, fertilizers, and other things.  He is hoping for this assistance so that he can improve his house because his greatest dream is to have it well painted and very nice.  He is thankful to God for the opportunity and for not leaving him or his family alone.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies.

loans.name: Jose Eduardo

texts.es: José habita junto a su familia su esposa y sus hijos, es un hombre trabajador, honesto y decidido a seguirle brindando un buen futuro a su familia.  Con sus buenos modales y forma de tratar a la gente es responsable con sus obligaciones de hogar y todo lo hace pensando en sus hijos quienes son su principal fuente de inspiración para seguir adelante. Actualmente José se dedica a la crianza de ganado y al cultivo de granos básicos es así como honradamente se gana la vida, y hace que su familia posea grandes admiraciones porque se caracterizan por ser trabajadores y visionarios. El cliente desea comprar insumos agrícolas para sus cultivos ya que se vienen épocas de cosechas y desea tener lo necesario es por eso que solicita a INTEGRAL un préstamo para la compra de Semillas, abonos, fertilizantes, pesticidas entre otros. Espera tener la ayuda solicitada para tener las mejores cosechas y venderlos como siempre lo ha hecho y que en su hogar no falte el pan de cada día.
texts.en:
José lives with his family; his wife and children, and is a hardworking, honest and dedicated man who wants to continue providing a good future for his family.  With his good intentions and the way he treats others, he is responsible with his household obligations and does everything with his children in mind.  They are his source of inspiration to continue ahead.

José raises livestock and basic grains.  This is how he makes an honest living and his family admires that.  They are known for being hardworking visionaries.  He wants to buy farming supplies because the harvest season is approaching and he wants to have what he needs on hand.  He will use the money to buy seeds, compost, fertilizer, pesticides, and other things.  He is hoping for this assistance so that he will have a better harvest and can sell it as he has always done, and so that his family is not in need of their daily bread.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies.

loans.name: Jose Luis

texts.es: José de 56 años de edad y habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su compañera de vida y sus hijos. Él se dedica a la agricultura desde hace muchos años. José  cultiva los principales granos básicos como: arroz, frijoles y maíz. Cada año repite esta actividad ya que es la única forma que conoce para ganarse la vida, Aunque también tiene una pequeña siembra de pitos.  Es una persona muy trabajadora, responsable y emprendedora. Vale la pena mencionar que vive en condiciones muy humildes junto con su familia, pero esta situación no lo desanima si no que le da fuerzas para continuar luchando por una calidad de vida diferente.. Trabaja muy duro para llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar ya que no cuenta con otra fuente de ingresos  diferente a la agricultura. Es por esta razón que ha tomado la decisión de solicitar es préstamo a INTEGRAL para invertir en la compra Semillas, Abonos, Fertilizantes, pesticidas entre otros.  Ya que es la época para realizar la siembra de los diferentes granos,  con mucha confianza en Dios y en su trabajo espera tener una cosecha abundante de la cual pueda vender una parte y dejar otra parte para el consumo. Espera cumplir su sueño de dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: José is 56 years old and lives in a home of his own, along with his wife and children.  He is a farmer and has been for many years.  José raises the basic grains, rice, corn, and beans.  Each year he repeats this activity and it’s his only want to make a living.  He also has a small crop of “pitos.”  He is a very hardworking, responsible, and enterprising person.  It’s also worth mentioning that he lives very humbly with his family; this does not discourage him, but rather strengthens him to continue working for a different quality of life.  He works very hard to provide for his family’s daily bread since he has no other source of income besides farming.  For this reason he decided to request a loan through INTEGRAL to invest in seeds, compost, fertilizer, pesticides, and other things, now that the planting season for the various grains has arrived.  With great faith in God and in his work, he expects to have an abundant harvest that he can partially sell and keep the rest for personal consumption.  He hopes to be able to achieve his dream of providing his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth is 50 years old and married with seven children.

Elizabeth works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 10,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) loan through NWTF to purchase additional stock to sell like canned goods, spices, sugar, soft drinks, etc.

Elizabeth has borrowed and repaid 10 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for eight years and also earns an income from raising pigs.

Elizabeth aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock to sell like canned goods, spices, sugar, soft drinks, etc.

loans.name: San Roque Group

texts.es:
El comité San Roque es un trabajador grupo de la ciudad de Caacupé, una de sus miembros es la Sra. Elba, quien con sus compañeras trabaja y se ayudan para salir adelante.
Elba se dedica a la venta de bebidas, y gracias al tiempo que lleva con este negocio se ha hecho de muy buena clientela. Solicita de este crédito para invertirlo en comprar cervezas, vinos, gaseosas y demás.
Ella y su grupo agradecen por la oportunidad que reciben,, ya que pueden ir creciendo y ayudando a sus familias.
texts.en:
The San Roque committee is a hardworking group from Caapucé.  Elba is one of its members and she and fellow members who help one-another to get ahead. 

Elba sells drinks and has many customers, thanks to the amount of time she has in this business.  She is asking for this loan to buy beer, wine, soft drinks, and others.

The group is thankful for their opportunity because they can keep growing and helping their families.

loans.use: to buy drinks.

loans.name: Las Amazonas Group

texts.es:
Las Amazonas es otro grupo de la ciudad de Caacupé, quienes se unieron con la esperanza de trabajar y ayudar a sus familias. Todas son trabajadoras y tienen un gran entusiasmo. Una de ellas es Claudia, quien también nos cuenta que su grupo es muy unido y que se llevan muy bien, y que gracias al apoyo de las unas con las otras están saliendo adelante.
Claudia vende ropas de todo tipo, y solicita de este crédito para poder invertirlo en la compra de prendas, ya que quiere seguir trabajando y ofreciendo buena variedad a sus clientes.
texts.en:
“Las Amazonas” is another group from the city of Caacupé, who got together in hopes of working and helping their families.  All are hard working and have great enthusiasm.  Claudia is among the members and she tells us that her group is very united and that they get along very well. They are all getting ahead thanks to their mutual support.

Claudia sells clothing of all types and is asking for this loan to invest in clothing because she wants to continue working and offering good quality items to her customers.

loans.use: to buy clothing.

loans.name: Freciosa

texts.en:
As a married parent of two children, Freciosa works hard to support her family.

She has a buying and selling of firewood business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a general store and a motorcycle-transport business. 

Freciosa is borrowing 18,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) through NWTF to purchase additional stock of firewood to sell for her firewood business.

Freciosa has been sustaining her business activities through her past three loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream: to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock of firewood to sell.

loans.name: Fenix Group

texts.es:
Fenix es un excelente grupo de mujeres conformado en la ciudad de Itá, gracias a que una de las miembros contactó con la asesora en una reunión semanal que la misma tenía en la zona, una vez asesorada acerca del Programa logró juntar a 16 mujeres quienes se encuentran trabajando en el 6° ciclo, en forma conjunta y solidaria dentro del programa.
Cielo, quien es parte de este grupo cuenta que tiene una mercería con todo tipo de productos. Tiene un negocio bien surtido con muchos productos, como ser zapatos, ropas, artículos en general.
Cielo tiene como meta poder seguir creciendo en su negocio y por medio de su trabajo seguir ayudando a su familia.
texts.en:
“Fenix” is an excellent group of women in the city of Itá, thanks to one of the members having contacted an advisor from the program.  She managed to get 16 women together who are working together in their sixth program cycle.

Cielo, who is part of this group, says that she has a store with all types of products.  She keeps her store well stocked with many products such as shoes, clothing, and general items. Her goal is to continue growing her business and continuing to help her family through her work.

loans.use: to stock her store.

loans.name: Larajane

texts.en:
Larajane is 27 years old and has two children.  She is married and one of her children is in school.

Larajane is in the agricultural business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 12000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional livestock to sell. Larajane has been in this business for five years now, and has borrowed eleven times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Larajane would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional livestock to sell

loans.name: Santos Bautista

texts.es: Santos de 61 años de edad, habita en casa de su  propiedad junto con su esposa  y sus hijos. Él se dedica a la agricultura, es decir a la siembra de los principales granos básicos como maíz y Maicillo. Se ha dedicado a esta actividad toda su vida y es así como se gana el pan de cada día honradamente. Él es un hombre trabajador, responsable y muy conocido en la zona por su enorme corazón y amabilidad con las demás personas. Debido a que la temporada para la siembra se aproxima ha tomado la decisión de comenzar a prepararse para la llegada de esa fecha. Es por esa razón que ha decidido solicitar un crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en la compara de semillas, abonos, insecticidas, fertilizantes etc. Lo que más desea es que su cosecha sea abundante ya que es la única forma que conoce y hace para lograr tener acceso a una fuente de ingresos.  Además cuenta con buenas referencias de pagos. Confía en Dios que con su ayuda y su arduo trabajo lograr su sueño de lograr mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Santos is 61 years old and lives in a home of his own along with his wife and children.  He is a farmer and raises the basic grains; corn and “maicillo.”  He has been doing this all of his life and this is how he earns an honest living.

He is a hardworking and responsible man, well known in the zone for his enormous heart and love of others.  Given that the planting season is approaching, he decided to begin preparing for it, so he decided to request a loan thorough INTEGRAL so he can buy seeds, compost, insecticide, fertilizer, etc.  What he wants the most is for his harvest to be abundant, since this is the only source of income he knows.  He comes with good credit references and has faith in God that with your help and his own arduous work, he will be able to provide a better quality of life for his family.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies.

loans.name: Gingle

texts.en:
Gingle is 33 years old and has four children. Gingle is married, and three of her children are in school.

Gingle is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Gingle requested a 10,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) loan through NWTF to buy additional feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

Gingle has been raising pigs for five years now, and has borrowed four times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Gingle would like to save money to expand her business and send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
Jocelyn is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a business in the Philippines buying and selling dried coconut meat. 

She is borrowing 10,000 Philippine pesos (PHP) through the Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation (NWTF) to buy more stock of dried coconut meat for her business in which she buys and sells dried coconut meat.

Jocelyn has been in this business for 5 years. Jocelyn earns additional income from raising livestock and selling coconut shells.

Jocelyn has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving enough money so that she can afford to send her children to college in the future.

loans.use: to buy more stock of dried coconut meat to sell.

loans.name: Letecia

texts.en:
Letecia is 49 years old and married with four children.

She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. Letecia is borrowing 13,000 Philippine pesos (PHP) through the Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation (NWTF) to buy additional feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Letecia has been raising pigs for 10 years and also earns additional income from a general store.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough money so that she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Mila

texts.en:
Mila works hard to support her family. Mila is married and has a buying and selling of flowers business in the Philippines.

Mila requested a 10,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) loan through NWTF to purchase additional flowers to sell.

Mila has been in this business for 18 years now.

In the future, Mila would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional flowers to sell.

loans.name: Dayana

texts.es:
La señorita Dayana es empleada de un restaurante;vive en  alquiler con sus padres en un par de habitaciones con un acabado de adobe y piso de cemento, su vivienda esta ubicada en la zona de Irpavi de la ciudad de La Paz.
Dayana es empleada, del cual genera sus ingresos para cubrir sus gastos de alimentación, transporte y educación,  el crédito lo  requiere para la matrícula de universidad donde ella estudiará Administración de empresas y así mejorar su nivel de educación.
El sueño de Dayana es culminar sus estudios
Es la primera vez con IMPRO y la primera con Kiva.
texts.en:
Srta. Dayana works at a restaurant. She lives with her parents in a rental property that contains a pair of rooms that have an adobe finish and cement floors. Her home is located in the District of Irpavi in the city of La Paz.

Dayana is employed and the income from her job is used to cover expenses such as food, transportation, and education. The loan she is requesting will be used for her university tuition. She is studying Business Administration and this will improve her level of education.

Dayana’s dream is to finish her studies. This is the first time she has worked with IMPRO and Kiva.

loans.use: to pay for her university tuition.

loans.name: Nida

texts.en:
Nida is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a buying and selling of bananas business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing 30,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) through NWTF to buy more stock of bananas to sell for her banana business.

Nida has been in this business for 11 years. Nida earns more income from buying and selling charcoal.

Nida has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to build and expand her business to secure the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to buy more stock of bananas to sell.

loans.name: Teofista

texts.en:
Teofista is 67 years old and married with six children. She works very hard to provide for them.

Teofista runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 10,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) loan through NWTF to purchase additional items to sell, like coffee, sugar, soap, noodles, spices, etc.

Teofista has been in this business for 10 years.

In the future, Teofista would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional items to sell, like coffee, sugar, soap, noodles, spices, etc.

loans.name: Luz

texts.es:
La Señora Luz tiene 41 años, está casada, vive en la Ciudad de Itá, tiene  2 hijos, uno de 21 y otro de 20. Ella se dedica al macate (venta ambulante), vende todo tipo de ropas, calzados deportivos, electrodomésticos en general, sabanas, ollas entre otros. Este trabajo lo realiza desde varios años, tiene una clientela bien formada en distintos lugares de la zona.
Ella solicita de este crédito para poder invertirlo en la compra de ropas, calzados deportivos, y demás, con los que podrá seguir trabajando y creciendo, ya que con esto también ayuda a su familia.
texts.en:
Sra. Luz is 41 years old, married, and lives in the city of Itá. She has two children, ages 21 and 20.

Luz is a traveling merchant and sells all types of clothing, sports shoes, general household appliances, bed sheets, cookware, and other items. She has been in this line of work for several years. Luz has well-established customers in different parts of the district.

Luz is requesting this loan so that she can invest in the purchase of clothing, sport shoes, and other items. This will enable her to continue working and growing and also allow her to help her family.

loans.use: to buy clothing and sports shoes.

loans.name: Jocil

texts.en:
Jocil is  25 years-old and lives in Caputol, Aloran, Misamis Occidental. She is married  with two children. 

To earn a living, Jocil has a sari-sari store which sells a variety of products. She earns about PHP 10,000 each month doing this type of work. Jocil hasrequested a loan of PHP 49,900.00 in order to purchase more stock for her general store such as shampoo, toothpaste, soap, etc. 

Jocil has been a member of Kiva partner PMPC for four years.  In the future, Jocil hopes to have more savings.

loans.use: to purchase more stock for her general store such as shampoo, toothpaste, soap, etc.

loans.name: Yumjargal

texts.en:
Mr.Yumjargal is 33 years-old and lives with his wife and three children in Ger in Uvs province. His wife, Narantuya, is a construction designer and works part-time at a private construction company. His son Dashnyam, age nine, goes to a local primary school and daughter Nomin-Erdene, age five, and son Bat-Orgil, age three, go to a local kindergarten. 

The borrower is an interior designer and also works part-time at private company from April to October. He is now planning to start a taxi service business within the area and is requesting a loan of 1'500'000MNT in order to purchase a used car to start his taxi service business. He is a hardworking and diligent man.

loans.use: to purchase a used car to start a taxi service business.

loans.name: Amilcar

texts.es: Amílcar de 34 años de edad  vive junto a su esposa y sus hijos. Se dedica  al cultivo y comercio de granos básicos como: maíz y frijoles y una pequeña parcela de loroco. Cada año repite esta actividad, siembra la semilla, saca la cosecha y por ultimo pone  a la venta una  parte y la otra la deja para consumo.  Es así como se gana la vida y es importante mencionar que es su principal fuente de ingresos. Amílcar   se caracteriza por ser un hombre trabajador, honrado y muy responsable. Muchas personas dan buenas referencias de él y confían en el producto que comercializa. Ha tomado la decisión de acercarse a esta institución, INTEGRAL, para solicitar este crédito el cual le permita comprar los principales insumos agrícolas como: semillas, insecticidas, abonos, pesticidas entre otros. Y así continuar cultivando la tierra para cosechar los principales  granos básicos que le permiten llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar. Confía en Dios todo poderoso que obtendrá resultados favorables y podrá lograr su sueño de mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Amílcar is 34 years old and lives with his wife and children.  He is a farmer and raises the basic grains; corn and beans.  He also has a small plot where he raises loroco.  He does this every year; plants the seeds, harvests the crop, sells part of it and uses the rest for personal consumption.  This is how he earns a living and it’s important to mention that this is his main source of income.

Amílcar is known for being a hardworking, honest, and responsible man.  Many people provide him with good references and they trust in the products he sells.  He decided to approach INTEGRAL to ask for a loan that will allow him to buy supplies, such as seeds, insecticides, compost, pesticides, and other things.  In this way he can continue cultivating the land to harvest the basic grains that allow him to provide the daily bread for his home.  He has faith in God almighty that he will obtain good results and that he will be able to achieve his dream of improving his family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies.

loans.name: Po Joayu Group

texts.es:
Este comité se formo en la Ciudad de Caaguazú, lleva por nombre Po joayu, es conformado por 13 señoras  trabajadoras independientes que se unieron para trabajar en equipo con la Fundación Paraguaya. Cada una es solidaria, responsable y saben trabajar en equipo. Las mismas agradecen por todo el apoyo constante recibido.
Lidia vende verduras, y se dedica a esto hace ya un tiempito, es una persona que se esfuerza mucho por salir adelante y con este trabajo ayuda a su familia. Solicita este crédito para la compra de verduras y así seguir teniendo buenos productos que poder ofrecer  buena calidad a sus clientes.
texts.en:
This committee was formed in the city of Caaguazul, its name is Po joayu, it's formed by 13 hardworking, independent ladies, that got together to work as a team with the Paraguayan Foundation.  Each of them is helpful, responsible and they work as a team.  They are thankful for the constant support received.
Lidia sells vegetables, has done this for a while, she is a person that works hard to get ahead and with this work she helps her family.  She requests a loan to buy vegetables and be able to have good products to offer good quality to her clients.

loans.use: to buy vegetables for sale.

loans.name: Gil

texts.en:
Gil is unmarried.  He is 48 years-old and lives in the Philippines.

He is a farmer and he buys and sells coconuts in order to earn a living. He has been doing this for 20 years.  He has requested a loan to use in his business.

Gil has been a member of Kiva partner PMPC for three years. In the future, Gil hopes to have more savings.

loans.use: to obtain capital to buy and sell coconuts.

loans.name: Tripona

texts.en:
Tripona is 59 years old and lives in Poblacion, Tampilisan, Zamboanga del Norte.  She is married with 8 children. 
Tripona sells 'Ready to Wear' clothing to earn a living and has had this business for 10 years. Each month, she earns 2000 from this business. She has requested a loan for 5000  to purchase more 'Ready to Wear' clothes.  Tripona became a member of PMPC this year.  In the future, she hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more Ready To Wear clothes

loans.name: Narantsetseg

texts.en:
Mrs.Narantsetseg is 58 years old lives with her husband in a small house in Selenge province. Her husband Donoi stays home and works as a Russian to Mongolian translator. Her 2 children are married and live separately from them.

Mrs.Narantsetseg has been taught by Russian agrarian how to grow mushrooms and produce organic products from them. She has started her organic mushroom growing and producing business last year. She is now requesting 1'000'000 MNT to install a heating system to her mushroom growing green house, to extend the period of growing. She is a hardworking, welcoming and modest woman.

loans.use: to install heating system in her mushroom growing green house, to extend the period of growing

loans.name: Amado

texts.en:
Amado is married with two children. Amado is 28 years old and lives in Farmington, Tampilisan, Zamboanga del Norte.

Amado is a farmer and grows corn, camote (sweet potato) and other crops to earn a living. He has been doing this for three years. He has requested a loan of 5000 PHP to purchase fertilizer.

Amado has been a member of PMPC for one year. In the future, Amado hopes to expand his garden to plant other crops.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy a sewing machine for her sewing business.

loans.name: Monhjargal

texts.en: Monhjargal is 50 years old and lives with his wife and four sons in a small house in the Dari-Eh district of Ulaanbaatar, Mongolia. His wife, Narantsetseg, age 39, runs a small grocery store in a spare part of their land. His sons Zayadelger, Buyanzaya, Oyunzaya and Nandin-Erdene go to a local school. Monhjargal has been running a taxi service since 2008. His wife has been running her small grocery store for years and has built a better commitment with customers and suppliers. He is now requesting 2,000,000 MNT to purchase construction materials to renovate his home in order to reduce the heat loss. He is a hardworking and responsible man who also has a good record in previous loans from XacBank.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials to renovate his home in order to reduce the heat loss

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to make decoration pieces for sale at the gift shops in the market.

loans.name: Saul Oswaldo

texts.es: Saúl de 51 años de edad  habita en casa de su propiedad  junto con su grupo familiar su esposa y sus hijos. Él se dedica al cultivo de granos básicos es decir Maíz, Frijol y maicillo. Este ha sido su negocio desde hace muchos años, y es lo que le permite llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar. Saúl es un hombre muy trabajador del cual muchas personas dan buenas referencias.  Por medio del cultivo de estos productos es como puede ir subsistiendo él y su familia ya que cada año al sacar la cosecha pone a la venta una parte para sacar los ingresos necesarios para cubrir otras necesidades del hogar. Su deseo es  invertir  un poco más en la agricultura con el fin de cosechar una mayor cantidad de granos básicos que le permitan mejorar su nivel de  ventas como sus ingresos. Esta es la razón por la  que tomo la decisión de acercarse  a INTEGRAL,  para invertir en la compra de los insumos agrícolas como: abonos, semillas,  fertilizantes, pesticidas etc.  Para invertir en la cosechar de una  mayor cantidad  de granos básicos y lograr el objetivo final de mejorar sus condiciones de vida y las de su familia. Confía en Dios y en su trabajo que logrará resultados favorables
texts.en: Saúl is 51 years old and lives in a home of his own with his wife and children.  He raises basic grains, corn, beans, maicillo.  This has been his business for many years and it allows him to provide for his family.  Saúl is a hardworking man with good references.  This is how he is able to support himself and his family.  He sells part of his harvest to earn an income and retains the other part for the household needs.  He wants to invest a little more into the farming so that he can have a bigger harvest and improve his sales and income, so he came to INTEGRAL for a loan so that he can buy compost, seeds, fertilizers, pesticides, etc.  He wants a bigger harvest of basic grains so that he can reach his goal of improving his family’s living conditions.  He has faith in God that he will have good results.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies

loans.name: Banamali

texts.en:
Banamali runs a grocery shop in the small village of Balipatna in Odisha, India. He sells wheat flour, lentils, spices, edible oil, salt, biscuits, etc. He has five years of experience in this activity and earns 2,500 INR per month from his business.

Banamali is a 35-year-old differently able person living with his family. He has requested a loan of 20,000 INR to make a showcase in his shop so that he can properly display the stock kept in his shop and to purchase more stock of the grocery items that he sells.

He wants to save some money for his secure future and give his parents a standard living.

loans.use: to pay for constructing a showcase and purchasing spices, edible oil, rice, wheat flour, etc.

loans.name: Julieta

texts.en:
Julieta is married with three children. Julieta is 56 years old and lives in Compra, Liloy, Zamboanga del Norte.

Julieta sells noodles, canned goods and other items to earn a living, and has had this business for three years. Each month, she earns 5,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) doing this type of work. She has requested a loan of 5,000 PHP to purchase noodles, canned goods and other items.

Julieta became a member of PMPC this year. In the future, Julieta hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase noodles, canned goods and other items.

loans.name: Rahima

texts.en:
Rahima is a 29-year-old differently able lady living with her parents and her children in a village in Odisha, India. She runs a grocery shop where she sells lentils, rice, edible oil, wheat flour, spices, salt, biscuits, etc. She has very good relations with her customers. She earns 5,000 INR from this shop, which is not enough for her family to survive.

She has a plan to add more stock of what she sells to her shop plus a few more products like hair oil, shampoo, potatoes, onions, etc. Rahima has requested a loan of 30,000 INR to purchase more stock of what she sells and the new products that are mentioned above. She says that doing so will attract more customers as she would be able to fulfill the maximum demands of her customers and will increase her client base.

She has a dream of having her children well educated and saving some money for their future.

loans.use: to purchase hair oil, shampoo, potatoes, onions, lentils, wheat flour, etc. for her grocery shop.

loans.name: Gloria Marlene

texts.es: Gloria de 35 años de edad y habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su grupo familiar su esposo y sus hijos. Ella se dedica  a la agricultura de granos básicos como maíz, frijol y además con esfuerzo y dedicación tienen una pequeña crianza de ganado. Esta actividad la realiza  junto a su esposo y es así como logran llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar.  Gloria es una mujer emprendedora, trabajadora  y responsable.  Siempre se ha  dedicado a la agricultura por lo que  conoce muy bien la manera de hacer esta activada. Cada año realiza esta actividad de la cual vende una parte de su cosecha y la otra la deja para consumo. Es así como poco a poco va saliendo adelante y dando a su familia el alimento básico. Vive en condiciones muy humildes junto con su familia, esto la hace agarrar más fuerzas para seguir luchando por un futuro diferente. Ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en la compra de  insumos agrícolas como: semillas, abonos, insecticidas, etc. Es así como  se gana la vida y lleva el pan de cada día a su hogar. Espera que  este año la cosecha sea favorable y logre cumplir su sueño.
texts.en: Gloria is 35 years old and lives in a home of her own with her husband and children.  She is a farmer and raises the basic grains, corn and beans, and also raises some livestock with great effort and dedication.  She does this alongside her husband and this is how she brings home the daily bread.  Gloria is a hardworking, enterprising, and responsible woman.  She has always been a farmer and knows this activity well.  Each year she sells part of her harvest and keeps the other part for personal consumption.  In this way she gets ahead little by little and feeds her family.  She lives under humble conditions with her family and she does this to gain strength and continue to struggle for a different future.  She has decided to request a loan through INTEGRAL so that she can buy supplies such as seeds, compost, insecticides, etc.  She hopes to have a good harvest this year and that she will achieve her dream.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies.

loans.name: Melba

texts.en:
Melba is married with two children. She is 65 years old and lives in Liloy-Comunal, Zamboanga del Norte.

Melba sells noodles, canned goods, cigarettes and other items to earn a living and has had this business for 10 years. Each month, she earns 10,000 PHP doing this type of work. She has requested a loan of 14,900 PHP to purchase more noodles, canned goods, cigarettes and other items.

Melba has been a member of PMPC for two years. In the future, Melba hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more noodles, canned goods, cigarettes and other items to sell

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy used sweaters to make thread to sell

loans.name: Madelyn

texts.en:
Madelyn is from San Carlos, Tukuran. She is 31 years old, and married with one child. Madelyn owns and operates a business providing trysikad (pedicab) services. She's been in business for six years and earns 4,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) a month. 

In 2009, Madelyn joined GDMPC. Madelyn is requesting a loan of 8,000 PHP, which will be used to  purchase accessories and spare parts for her pedicab. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase accessories and spare parts for her pedicab.

loans.name: Marcos

texts.es:
El Señor Marcos tiene 55 años, está casado con la Señora Ana,  tienen 2 hijas una de 21 años y otra de 24 años. Don Marcos se inició con su despensa hace más de 5 años,  comenzó con un capital pequeño, que invirtieron en la compra de artículos solo de primera necesidad donde se dedicaban a eso y a la vez también tenía otro trabajo donde era empleado. Hoy en día su negocio ya es muy grande donde cuenta con mucha más gente que compra de él.
Solicita de este crédito para poder invertirlo en la compra de bebidas, gaseosas, verduras, hortalizas y demás. Agradece por esta oportunidad que recibe, pues le será de mucha ayuda.
texts.en:
Marcos is 55 years old and married to Ana.  They have two daughters, ages 21 and 24.  Marcos started a grocery store five years ago with a little capital which they invested in primary needs products.  He also had another job.  Now his business is very large and he has more customers.

He is asking for this loan to invest in drinks, soft drinks, vegetables, and other things.  He is grateful for this opportunity as it will be very helpful.

loans.use: to stock his store.

loans.name: Victoria

texts.es:
Victoria, de 56 años, es una mujer tímida. Vive en compañía de Juan, su esposo; ambos tienen 5 hijos pero solo viven con uno de ellos, Juan al que educan en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Pampa blanca. Se encuentra delicada de salud, pues el frío de la zona le causa gripa. Se siente muy feliz, pues en este momento recibe el apoyo de su esposo quien se levanta muy temprano para continuar con las labores agrícolas. Sus sembríos constan de olluco, papa, maíz y demás alimentos. Los cuales vende en la ciudad de Pampas cada viernes que se realiza la feria. Además de tener toros que le ayudan en la faena agrícola, como el arado de la tierra. Asimismo vacas y 3 cerdos que engorda para luego vender a los carniceros a mayor precio, de ahí obtiene ingresos extras. Ahora está pensando sembrar olluco después de la cosecha de maíz que dentro de algunos días terminará. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “pampa blanca” y este es el crédito número 10 con MFP, donde se siente feliz, ya que tiene muchos años trabajando con su asociación, donde los integrantes son personas, humanas y sobre todo con muchas ganas de ayudarse entre ellos.
Victoria de recibir su apoyo, invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de un toro, para que le ayude en el arado de la tierra, ya que cuenta con uno y solo le falta uno más para comenzar con el trabajo.
texts.en:
Victoria is 56 years old and a timid woman.  She lives with her husband, Juan and the have five children; only one, Juan, still lives at home.  They home school him.  Their home is located in Pampa Blanca.  Her health is fragile and the cold climate causes her to get sick. She is happy because she is getting her husband’s support.  She gets up very early to do the farm work and has ulluco, potato, corn and other crops, which she sells in Pampas each Friday when there is a fair.  She also has bulls that help with the farming tasks, such as plowing the land.  She has cows, and three pigs that she will fatten up and sell to butchers for a profit.  In this way she earns some extra income.  Now she’s considering planting ulluco after the corn harvest, which will finish in a few days.  She belongs to the “Pampa Blanca” communal bank and this will be her 10th loan through MFP.  She feels happy and says that she has many years working with her association, where the members are human and above all want to help each other.

Victoria will use the money to buy a bull so that it can help plow the land.  She has one and needs one more to begin work.

loans.use: to buy a bull.

loans.name: Yolanda

texts.es:
Yolanda, de 35 años. Es una mujer sencilla, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo Sabino, con quien tiene 2 hijos pequeños, que cuida y educa con mucho amor. Desde que ere muy pequeña, comenzó adquiriendo todos los conocimientos que haría que en la actualidad se dedique a ser agricultora. Cuenta muy contenta, que pasa la mayor parte de su día en el campo, entre cerros, praderas y ríos. Gusta del aire del campo y del trabajo que realiza, sus principales sembríos constan de maíz, papa, trigo y demás tubérculos que le brinda la tierra. Los que comercializa en sus mismos terrenos agrícolas, pues ya tiene clientes que siempre llagan en la temporada de cosecha. Pero como es una mujer muy inteligente, también se dedica a la crianza de animales como vacas, ovejas y cerdos, “al engordar los animales, puedes vender a un mayor precio en cualquier momento”, comenta. De esa manera posee ingresos constantes para su hogar y no pasa por apuros económicos. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “pampa blanca” y este es el crédito número 6 con MFP, donde se siente feliz, ya que tiene muchos años trabajando con su asociación, donde los integrantes son personas, humanas y sobre todo con muchas ganas de ayudarse entre ellos.
Yolanda, invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de abono orgánico para nutrir sus próximos sembríos.
texts.en:
Yolanda, age 35, is a modest woman who lives in her own home with her husband Sabino. They have two small children who they care for with much love and for whom they provide an education. From a very young age, Yolanda began acquiring all of the knowledge she currently uses in her job as a farmer. She is very content to spend most of her time outdoors among the hills, the meadows, and the rivers. Yolanda enjoys working in the fresh air. Her main crops include corn, potatoes, and wheat, but she also harvests tubers that are produced on her land. The crops are sold directly from her farmland since her customers come to her during the harvest season. Being a very intelligent woman, Yolanda also spends time raising animals such as cows, sheep, and pigs. “By fattening the animals, I am able to sell at a higher price at any given moment,” she says. Yolanda is able to generate a constant stream of household income, so she is able to avoid financial hardships.

She is a member of the Communal Bank “Pampa Blanca” (White Plain) and this is her sixth loan with MFP. Yolanda is happy to have worked with her group for many years and all of the members are humane individuals who have the desire to help one another.

With the money she requested, Yolanda will invest in the purchase of organic compost for her crops during the next planting season.

loans.use: to buy organic compost.

loans.name: Cerenisa

texts.en: Cerenisa is married, with 6 kids. She is 36 years old and lives in Panduma, Tukuran. Cerenisa provides transportation services to earn a living. She's been doing this for three years and every month she earns PHP 2,300 from this work. She has requested a loan of PHP 5,000 to repair a transport vehicle used in the business. In 2010, Cerenisa joined GDMPC. In the future, she hopes to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to repair a transport vehicle used in the business

loans.name: Eradh Group

texts.en: This group is called Eradh and consists of five ladies who live in Taiz, Yemen. Wafa is 26 years old. She is a responsible woman who works hard to make good financial standards. She applied for a youth loan of 30000 YER from AMB to buy home appliances like a fridge to use for her home.

loans.use: to buy home appliances like a fridge to use for her home.

loans.name: Jennie

texts.en: Jennie is 21 years old, married with one child and living in Clarin. She earns a living through snack food vending. Jennie makes and sells cracker products. She has been doing this business for two years and earns 4,000 PHP a month from this work. Jennie has applied for a loan of 5,000 PHP from GDMPC to purchase additional cooking ingredients. She became a member of GDMPC just this year. Jennie hopes to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional cooking ingredients

loans.name: Valeriana

texts.es:
La señora Valeriana se dedica a la elaboración de polleras y mantas de vicuña, vive en casa propia con un acabado de ladrillo y piso de cemento, su vivienda está ubicada el la zona de Bajo Irpavi de la ciudad de La Paz.
Valeriana elabora polleras y mantas de vicuña, del cual genera sus ingresos para cubrir sus gastos de alimentación, luz, agua;  el crédito lo  requiere para la compra de una máquina de coser para aumentar su producción y así mejorar sus ingresos y su calidad de vida.
El sueño de Valeriana es tener un taller de costura en su domicilio.
Es la doceava vez con IMPRO y la quinta con Kiva.
texts.en:
Sra. Valeriana makes skirts and blankets out of vicuña wool. She lives in her own house that has a brick exterior and cement floors. Her home is located in the District of Bajo Irpavi in the city of La Paz.

Valeriana produces skirts and blankets from vicuña wool so that she can generate income to cover expenses such as food, electricity, and water. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy a sewing machine so that she can increase production, generate more income, and improve her quality of life.

Her dream is to have a sewing workshop in her home. This is the 12th time Valeriana has worked with IMPRO and the fifth time with Kiva.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy baked goods to sell.

loans.name: Cristhian

texts.es:
El Joven Cristhian  tiene 22 años de edad, es soltero y vive en la ciudad de Carapeguá. Como proviene de una familia que se dedica netamente a la fabricación y ventas de artesanía él decidió salir con su padre a vender sus productos, en poco tiempo logró juntar un poco de capital para empezar a comprar más variedad de artículos, como ser hamacas, frazadas edredones, etc. y llevar a vender por la capital del país, Asunción, donde ya tiene una buena clientela formada. Gracias a su trabajo y esfuerzo  pudo comprarse una motocicleta  la cual utiliza para realizar sus ventas y mantener la buena clientela.
Solicita el préstamo para la compra de hamacas, frazadas, fajas y sábanas puesto que tiene muchos pedidos de estos productos y quiere cumplir con sus clientes.
texts.en:
Cristhian is a young man who is 22 years of age. He is single and lives in the city of Carapeguá. Since he comes from a family that is entirely devoted to producing and selling handicrafts, Cristhian decided that he would help his father sell these products. Over a short period of time, he was able to accumulate a small amount of capital so that he could begin buying a wider variety of products such as hammocks, blankets, quilts, and other items that he could sell in the Paraguayan capital of Asunción where he has a well-established clientele. Thanks to his efforts, he was able to buy a motorcycle that he uses for making sales and visiting his customers.

Cristhian is requesting a loan so that he can buy hammocks, blankets, belts, and bed sheets. He has many orders for these products, so he wants to keep his customers satisfied.

loans.use: to buy hammocks, blankets, belts, and bed sheets.

loans.name: Al-Azhar Group

texts.en: This group is called Al-Azhar. It consists of five ladies who live in Taiz, Yemen. Ghna is 23 years old, married and has children who live in Taiz. She has been selling sheep. She applied for a youth loan of 30,000 YER from AMB to buy livestock for her business. She hopes to improve her living standard.

loans.use: to buy livestock for her business.

loans.name: Richard

texts.en: Richard is from Camanga, Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur. He is 28 years old and single. To make a living, Richard makes and sells snack foods like crackes. Richard has been engaged in his business for two years and earns PHP 3,600 a month for these activities. Richard is requesting a loan of PHP 5,000, which will be used to purchase additional cooking ingredients. Recently, Richard joined GDMPC. He plans to use the additional revenue generated from the loan to improve and expand his business.

loans.use: to purchase additional cooking ingredients

loans.name: Yusufjon

texts.ru:
Юсуфджон житель города Дангара. Ему 35 лет. Он женат. Жена Юсуфджона домохозяйка. Его старший сын учится в школе, а трое других (сын и двое дочерей) маленькие. Юсуфджон имеет средне - специальное образование. Он уже десять лет как работает шафером. Юсуфджон уравновешенный и трудолюбивый человек. Помимо своей работы он занимается растениеводством. Он сеет пшеницу и выращивает овощи. Этим видом деятельности он занимается более тринадцати лет. 
Юсуфджон берет кредит для закупа семян и топлива, чтобы посеять пшеницу и картошку.
texts.en:
Yusufjon is a resident of Dangara.  He is 35 years old and married.  Yusufjon's wife is a homemaker.  His oldest son is in school, but the three others are still too young.   Yusufjon has a specialized secondary level education.  He has been working as a driver for already ten years.  Yusufjon is a level-headed and hardworking man.  Besides his regular job, he is also a farmer.  He grows wheat and vegetables.  He has been in this business for more than 13 years.  

Yusufjon is taking out this loan to buy seed and fuel for planting wheat and potatoes.

loans.use: to buy wheat and potato seed, and fuel

loans.name: Urmila

texts.en: Urmila is a 43-year-old divorced lady living with her parents and brother. She manages a tailoring shop where she stitches dresses like salwar suits (traditional Indian dress), frocks etc. for her customers who give orders for stitching. After the divorce from her husband, she came to her paternal home. She did not want to be a burden on her parents so she started a tailoring shop. She earns only 3,500 INR per month from this business. She planned to purchase two new sewing machines so that she can enlarge her business and take orders from her customers in bulk. Urmila has requested a loan of 25,000 INR to purchase two sewing machines and fabrics. She also wants to hire some work force to help her. She wants to give a good living standard to her family and save some money for their future.

loans.use: to purchase new sewing machines for her tailoring shop.

loans.name: Ronne Mar

texts.en: Ronne Mar, 27 years old, is a single entrepreneur from Camanga, Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur. He is earning an income from selling snack food. It started almost two years ago and he earns 3,800 PHP a month. To improve business, he is borrowing 5,000 PHP from GDMPC micro credit, which he just joined recently to obtain more food products to sell. He’s hopeful of the possibility of expanding his business before long.

loans.use: to obtain more food products to sell.

loans.name: Wilson

texts.en: Wilson's main source of income comes from his gardening business. He is 56 years old, married with 7 kids. He is from Camanga, Tukuran and has been  gardening for seven years, earning an amount of 6,550 PHP a month. In 2011, Wilson joined GDMPC. Wilson is requesting a loan of 10,000 PHP which will be used to purchase additional seeds, seedlings and young crops to raise. He plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of his family.

loans.use: to purchase additional seeds, seedlings and young crops to raise.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy a new sewing machine for her sewing business

loans.name: Rahmonali

texts.ru: Рахмонали проживает в городе Дангара. Ему 48 лет. Он живет с женой. У него шестеро детей. Двое его дочерей замужем. Рахмонали занимается растениеводством. У него имеется собственный небольшой участок земли, где он сеет пшеницу. Этим видом деятельности он занимается десять лет. Рахмонали берет кредит для закупа семян пшеницы и топлива, чтобы посеять и получить хороший урожай для продажи.
texts.en:
Rahmonali lives in Dangara.  He is 48 years old and married with six children.  His two daughters are married.  Rahmonali is in the farming business.  He owns a modestly sized plot of land where he raises wheat.  He has been in this business for ten years.  

Rahmonali is taking out this loan to buy seed and fuel for planting wheat in order to reap a good harvest for selling.

loans.use: to buy seed and fuel for planting wheat in order to reap a good harvest for selling

loans.name: Kholbibi

texts.ru: Холбиби проживает в Яванском районе. Ей 59 лет. Она вдова. У нее шестеро детей. Холбиби занимается растениеводством. У нее при доме имеется участок земли, где она выращивает овощи и сеет зернобобовые культуры. Этим видом деятельности Холбиби занимается пятнадцать лет. Она берет кредит для посева пшеницы.
texts.en: Kholbibi lives in the Yavan region.  She is 59 years old and a widow with six children.  Kholbibi is in the farming business.  She has a plot of land adjacent to her home where she grows vegetables and leguminous crops.  Kholbibi has been in this business for 15 years.  She is taking out this loan to sow wheat.

loans.use: to sow wheat

loans.name: Afrah Group

texts.en: This group is called Afrah. It consists of four ladies who live in Taiz, Yemen. Elham is 26 years old, married and has two children who live in Taiz. She is a housewife who feels comfortable with her family. She applied for a youth loan of 20,000 YER from AMB to buy a TV to use at home.

loans.use: to buy a TV to use at home

loans.name: Dillip Kumar

texts.en: Dillip Kumar is a 23-year-old differently able person living with his parents in a small village named Jajpur in Odisha, India. He owns and manages a variety store where he sells biscuits, hair oil, incense sticks, talcum powder, chocolates and other daily household consumables. He has a plan to expand his business by adding more stock of what he sells and a few new products like detergents, soap, deodorant spray, shampoo, wafers etc. to his shop. He says that doing so will help him increase his monthly income and fulfill his family's daily requirements. Dillip Kumar has applied for a loan of 30,000 INR to purchase more stock of what he sells and to renovate his shop.

loans.use: to pay for renovations and to purchase detergents, soap, deodorant spray, shampoo, wafers etc. for his shop.

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en: Mohammad is 32 years old from Gaza. He is married and has two children. He owns a place in which he sells lemon and olive wood. He asked Ryada for this loan in order to build an attic for wood storage. He hopes that this loan will improve his income.

loans.use: to build an attic for wood storage

loans.name: Ma. Victoria

texts.en: Ma. Victoria is 39 years old and lives in Curvada, Tukuran, Zamboanga Del Sur with her three children. For the last five years, she has earned a living by buying and selling various kinds of fruits. She earns about 10,000 PHP a month. In 2010, she joined GDMPC. She is applying for a loan of 15,000 PHP to buy more types of fruits to sell. She plans to use the additional income made possible by this loan to improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy more types of fruits to sell.

loans.name: Altyn

texts.ru: Алтын 56 лет, замужем, вырастила 6 детей. Алтын в качестве основного дохода с 1990 года занимается животноводством, начав этот бизнес с суммы в 10,000 сом. Благодаря упорному труду Алтын в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется очень развитое хозяйство.  В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Алтын обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 30,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 1 бычка и на оставшиеся средства она планирует купить овец для откорма и перепродажи. Доходы от кредита Алтын планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение количества домашней скотины. Целью всей жизни является дать высшее образование что бы они смогли устроить свою жизнь.
texts.en:
Altyn is 56 years old, married, and she raised six children.   Since 1990, their main source of income has been Altyn's livestock business, which she started with 10,000 som (KGS).  As a result of her hard work, today she has a highly developed business.

With an aim to further developing her business, Altyn applied to Bai Tushum & Partners for a loan of 30,000 som (KGS) for the purchase of a bull-calf and, with the remaining funds, sheep, which she will fatten for resale.  

Altyn plans to invest the profits from the loan in further increasing the number of cattle she has.  Her entire life's goal is to give her children higher educations so that they can get established in their own lives.

loans.use: to purchase a bull and sheep

loans.name: Tojiniso

texts.ru: Тоджинисо целеустремленная женщина. Она всегда старается улучшить условию проживания. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 2 детей. Ее муж работает в фермерской хозяйстве, и выращивает зерновые культуры. Тоджинисо несколько лет была без работы и надеялась на доход мужа, однако доход мужа маленький и поэтому она всегда была в финансовом недостатке. Она решила организовать свой бизнес и таким образом найти источник дохода. С такой целью она обучилась в курсе «Добейся успеха» организованный Ассоциация Деловых Женщин и получила сертификат. Она хочет организовать бизнес купле продажей скота, так как имеет опыт в этом виде бизнеса. От полученного дохода она планирует обеспечить своих детей с хорошим образованием. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 1200 сомони для покупки скота, чтобы организовать новый бизнес. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Tojiniso is a goal-oriented woman.  She is always trying to improve her living conditions.  She is married and she has two children.  Her husband works in farming and grows cereal crops.  For several years Tojiniso was unemployed and relied on her husband's income, which isn't very much, so she was always wanting for money.  

Tojiniso decided to start her own business to create her own source of income.   With this goal in mind, she studied in a course called "Attain Success" that is put on by the Association of Business Women, and she received her graudation certificate.  She wants to start a business in trading livestock, since she has experience in this field.  She plans to use the profits from the business to provide her children with good educations.  

She is requesting a loan of 1,200 somoni (TJS) to buy cattle and start her business.  She is relying on your kindness.

loans.use: to buy cattle to start a new business

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad is 29 years old from Gaza. He is married and has two children. He owns a shop for construction equipment rentals.

Mohammad has asked Ryada for this youth loan in order to buy wood for the shop. He hopes that this loan will help him improve his income.

loans.use: to buy wood for the shop.

loans.name: Muharram

texts.ru: Мухаррам женщина с тонким вкусом и конкретными целями. Она родилась и выросла с сельской местности и имеет большого опыта в сфере скотоводства и земледелия. Ей 34 года. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 2 детей. Дети Сабрина и Фариддун еще не совершеннолетние. Ее муж фермер и не справляется с обеспечением семьи со всеми не обходимыми средствами. Мухаррам решила помочь мужу для благо получения семьи. С такой целью она обучилась в курсе «Добейся успеха» организованный Ассоциация Деловых Женщин и получила сертификат. Теперь она вполне может организовать свой бизнес и стать успешной в этой сфере. Она хочет организовать бизнес выращиванием сельхоз культур как картошка, морковь, лук, капуста и т.п, так как имеет опыт в этом виде бизнеса. От полученного дохода она планирует улучшить условию проживания. Она запрашивает займ на сумму  2000 сомони для покупки семена и минерального удобрения, чтобы организовать новый бизнес. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Muharram is a woman of discriminating taste and she has concrete goals.  She was born and raised in the countryside and she has a great deal of experience with livestock and agriculture.  She is married and has two children.  Her children, Sabrina and Fariddun are still minors.  Her husband is a farmer and isn't able to provide the family with all the necessities, so Muharram decided to help her husband with the family's well-being.

With this aim, she studied in a course called "Attain Success" that is put on by the Association of Business Women, and she received her graduation certificate.  Now, she is fully capable of starting a business and being successful in her field.  Muharram wants to start a business growing crops such as potatoes, carrots, onions, cabbage, etc., since she has experience with this.  She plans to use the profits from her business to improve their living conditions.  

Muharram is requesting a loan of 2,000 somoni (TJS) to buy seed and mineral fertilizers to start her new business.  She is relying on your kindness.

loans.use: to buy seed and mineral fertilizers to start a new business

loans.name: Saleh

texts.en:
Saleh is photographed at his car wash business. He is a single 25-year-old young man. For the past one and a half years he has been operating a car wash located next to the main street where there is good traffic. This has been a profitable project and the only source of income for him.

Saleh is requesting a 1,500 USD youth loan from FATEN to help him cover the costs of purchasing car accessories, car wash equipment, and cleaning materials. This will attract more customers and increase Saleh's income and ensure him a bright future.

loans.use: to buy car accessories, car wash equipment, and cleaning materials for the car wash business.

loans.name: Mark Bryan

texts.en:
Mark Bryan is from Camanga, Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur. He is 24 years old. Mark Bryan is single. To make a living, Mark Bryan makes and sales snack foods like crackers. He has been engaged in his business for two years and earns PHP 3,900 a month for these activities. He is requesting a loan of PHP 5,000, which will be used to purchase additional cooking ingredients. 

Mark Bryan joined GDMPC recently. He plans to use the additional revenue generated from the loan to improve and expand his business.

loans.use: to purchase additional cooking ingredients.

loans.name: Baktygul

texts.ru: Бактыгул 39 лет. Бактыгул в качестве основного источника дохода для своей семьи, занимается животноводством, начав этот бизнес в 1998 году с суммы в 15,000 сом (KGS ). Благодаря упорному труду Бактыгул в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется очень развитое хозяйство, ежемесячная прибыль от хозяйства составляет около 5,000 сом (KGS).  В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Бактыгул обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку  бычков и овец для откорма и перепродажи. Доходы от кредита Бактыгул планирует вкладывать в развитие бизнеса, а в этом году хотела бы провести небольшой ремонт дома.
texts.en:
Baktygul is 39 years old.  Her family's main source of income is the livestock business that she started in 1998 with 15,000 som (KGS).  As a result of her hard work, today she has a highly developed business with a monthly income of about 5,000 som (KGS).  With an aim to further developing her business, Baktygul applied to Bai Tushum & Partners for a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) to buy bull-calves and sheep, which she will fatten and sell.  

Baktygul plans to invest the profits from the loan in the further development of her business and she would like to do some minor home repairs this year.

loans.use: to purchase bulls and sheep

loans.name: Nigora

texts.ru: Нигора очень красивая и трудолюбивая женщина. Ей 23 года. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 2 детей. Ее муж Далерчон, очень добрый человек и всегда старается обеспечить семью с хорошим условием. Нигора более 3 месяца занимается изготовлением и продажей разных салатов. Нигора прошла курс «Добейся успеха» организованный Ассоциация Деловых Женщин и получила сертификат. Она очень многому научилась. В дальнейшем Нигора планирует открыть отдельную точку продаж салатов и прием заказов. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 500 сомони для покупки разных овощей для приготовления салатов, чтобы развевать  новый бизнес. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Nigora is a beautiful and hard-working 23 year old.  She is married and has two children.  Her husband, Dalerchon, is a very kind man who always tries to be a good provider for his family.  

For three months, Nigora has been in business making and selling various kinds of salads.  Nigora went through a course called "Attain Success" that is put on by the Association of Business Women and received her graduation certificate.  She learned a lot from studying in the course.  In the future, Nigora plans to open a self-contained business location from which she will sell her salads and take special orders.  

In order to develop her business, she is requesting a loan of 500 somoni (TJS) to buy various vegetables for preparing salads.  She is relying on your kindness.

loans.use: to buy vegetables for making salad

loans.name: Yaser

texts.en: Yaser is a 28-year-old, married man who lives in Sana`a, Yemen. He owns a house and intends to renew his house. He is sharp, friendly, and a hardworking person. He is requesting a youth loan of 100,000 YER from AMB to buy construction supplies for his house.

loans.use: to buy construction supplies for his house.

loans.name: Zuhra

texts.ru:
Зухра проживает в районе Дж. Руми. Ей 53 года. Она замужем. У нее трое детей. Двое ее сыновей находятся в Российской Федерации. Зухра имеет высшее педагогическое образование. Она более 25 лет работает в школе. Зухра работает по профессии. В свободное от работы время она хочет заняться животноводством, чтобы улучшить финансовое положение в семье. 
Зухра берет кредит для закупа коров и бычков, чтобы заняться купле - продажей крупнорогатого скота. В этом ей будет помогать ее дочь.
texts.en:
Zuhra lives in the J.Rumy region.  She is 53 years old, married, and has three children.  Her two sons are in the Russian Federation.  Zuhra has a higher education in teaching and she has been teaching in a school for more than 25 years.  She wants to get into the business of raising cattle in her spare time in order to improve her family's financial position.  

Zuhra is taking out this loan to buy cows and bulls in order to start her business trading in cattle.  Her daughter will help her with the business.

loans.use: to buy cows and bulls

loans.name: Mahfirat

texts.ru: Махфирату 27 лет. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 2 детей.  Она обучилась в курсе «Добейся успеха» организованный Ассоциация Деловых Женщин и была одной из активных участниц. Более 2 месяца она занимается услугой парикмахера. Ежедневно она обслуживает 10-12 клиентов. В дальнейшем Махфират хочет открыть собственный салон красоты. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 500 сомони для покупки парикмахерского инструмента, чтобы организовать новый бизнес. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Mahfirat is 27 years old.  She is married and has two children.  She studied in a course called "Attain Success" that is put on by the Association of Business Women, and she was one of the most active participants.  For more than two months, she has been a hairdresser serving 10-12 clients a day.

Going forward, Mahfirat wants to open her own beauty salon.  She is requesting a loan of 500 somoni (TJS) to buy hair styling equipment in order to start her new business.  She is relying on your kindness.

loans.use: to buy hair styling equipment

loans.name: Abdulmajid

texts.en: Abdulmajid is a 25-year-old married man and has two children. He lives in Sana`a, Yemen. He has been operating a bookshop and call center which is the main source of his income. He started his business with little capital. He is working hard to continually provide income for the family's everyday expenses. Being an ambitious man, he would like to expand his business so he can provide his clients' needs and get more profit. So, he took out a youth loan of 200,000 YER from AMB to buy a xerox machine and a laptop for his business.

loans.use: to buy a printer and a laptop for his business.

loans.name: Monhbayar

texts.en:
Monhbayar is 39 years old and lives with his parents and sister in a ger in Suhbaatar district of Ulaanbaatar, Mongolia. His parents are both retired and stay at home. His sister works for a private company. 

Monhbayar has been running a taxi service within the area since 2010. He has been driving around the city and knows every location and the ways to drive there. He is a very experienced driver and a well-behaved person. 

Monhbayar is now requesting a loan of 3,500,000 MNT to change his car into an eco-friendly electric and gas car for his taxi service. He is a hard-working and welcoming person.

loans.use: to change his car into an eco-friendly electric and gas car for his taxi service

loans.name: Mercidita

texts.en:
Mercidita is 38 years old, is married and has six dependants. She lives in Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur.  Mercidita has run a sari-sari (variety) store for two years, earning a monthly income of 16,000 PHP. 

In 2010, Mercidita became a member of GDMPC. She is requesting a loan of 25,000 PHP to buy items such as milk, diapers, food products, etc. With the loan, Mercidita hopes to boost her income and improve her family’s general living conditions.

loans.use: to buy items such as milk, diapers, food products, etc.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Felipa

texts.en:
Felipa is from Sto. Niño, Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur. She is 60 years old, is widowed and has one child. To make a living, Felipa has planted, harvested,and sold rice for seven years and earns PHP 5,200 a month from these activities. 

In 2008, Felipa joined GDMPC. She is requesting a loan of PHP 10,000, which will be used to pay for the labor costs of rice harvesting. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve her family's general living conditions.

loans.use: to pay for the labor costs of rice harvesting.

loans.name: Zuurakan

texts.ru: Зуракан 45 лет, вдова. Мать 2 детей. В качестве источника дохода для семьи, Зуракан занимается животноводством. Начатое 4 года назад со стартовой суммы в 50,000 сом (KGS) хозяйство насчитывает на сегодня 1 дойные коровы, 1теленок и и приносит около 30,000 сом (KGS) в месяц от перепродажи скота. Также, Зуракан обрабатывает приемом цветного метала. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Зуракан обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 130,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота. Доходы Зуракан планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение хозяйства и в этом году женить сына
texts.en:
Zuurakan is 45 years old, a widow, and the mother of two children.  Her family's source of income is Zuurakan's livestock business.  She started the business four years ago with 50,000 som (KGS), and today she currently has one milk cow and a calf.  The business brings in about 30,000 som (KGS) per month from the sale of cattle.  Zuurakan also earns money by processing nonferrous metals.  

With an aim to further developing her business, Zuurakan applied to Bai Tushum & Partners for a loan of 130,000 som (KGS) to buy cattle.  Zuurakan plans to invest the profits from the loan in further expanding her business, and she plans to marry off her son this year.

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy a new sewing machine for her sewing business

loans.name: Ehab

texts.en:
Ehab is a 20-year-old single man. He is employed and earns a low salary which is not enough to cover all his needs. Ehab wants to help his brother who is studying at the university specializing in computer science and wants to complete his studies. 

So Ehab is requesting a USD loan from FATEN to help him cover the cost of purchasing a new laptop for his brother. This will help Ehab's brother to do his homework and reports and help him in his studies. This will ensure a better future for Ehab's brother and improve the family's living conditions.  Ehab is photographed at the store where he will purchase the laptop.

loans.use: To purchase a new laptop

loans.name: Khayriniso

texts.ru: Хайринисо проживает в районе Пяндж. Она замужем. Ей 60 лет. У нее трое детей. Ее дети находятся на заработках за рубежом. Хайринисо берет кредит для закупа мелко - рогатого скота. Она хочет заняться своим бизнесом. Хайринисо намерена заняться животноводством.
texts.en: Khayriniso lives in the Pyandj region.  She is 60 years old and married with three children.  Her children work abroad.  Khayriniso is taking out this loan to buy sheep and goats.  She wants to have her own business and she is intent upon the livestock business.

loans.use: to buy sheep and goats

loans.name: Rosefely

texts.en:
