Mario has decided on a loan because he feels that it allows him and his family many benefits.  With the loan he will pay for labor for harvesting basic grains in 10 production tasks.  Part of it will also allow him to pay for transport and to move his harvest to his home.  

He says that the last loan helped him to get a good harvest, and he has continued to work and has achieved many things through work.  At home, they have everything they need, and he and his wife have decided they can have another child.

loans.use: to pay for labor to gather the harvest.

loans.name: Caminando Hacie El Futuro 1 & 7 Group

texts.en:
Maria is one of the members of the group Caminando Hacie el Futuro (Walking to the Future) 1 & 7. This group is located in a rural community surrounded by sugarcane fields in the outskirts of San Pedro de Macoris. She makes her home in a simple structure with her long-term partner and a child. For the past four and a half years she has operated a beauty salon where she serves her clients and sells different products. She started her salon with her own capital after saving for a while.

Maria is excited to be a part of this fourth loan with Esperanza after having successfully repaid her previous loan portions and grown her business. She plans to use her loan to invest in her salon by buying hair and beauty products, cosmetics and other beauty supplies. Maria says that her most difficult challenges are improving her business and helping her family. Nevertheless, she plans to continue enjoying working in her salon. Maria thanks you all for your support!!!

loans.use: To buy hair and beauty products, cosmetics, and other supplies

loans.name: Afou

texts.fr:
Madame AFOU est en 1968 à Karibougou/Sikasso,  mère de 3 enfants elle vit chez son époux à Mandela (troisième région administrative de la république du Mali).
Elle mène cette activité commerciale depuis plus de 6 ans. Son expérience dans ce domaine, lui a valu une bonne réputation et reçoit des commandes de divers clients. Ainsi pour avoir les ressources nécessaires afin de satisfaire ces clients, elle décida de collaborer avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso, il ya 2 ans maintenant, tous les prêts antérieurs ont été correctement remboursés.  
Ce nouveau prêt lui permettra d’acheter 10 sacs de 50 kg de fonio et  5 sacs de maïs. Elle s’approvisionne dans les villages environnants de Mandela. Les ventes sont généralement faites à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes sur place et au marché de Sikasso. 
Avec ce prêt, elle envisage réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 20 000 FCFA par mois. Ce bénéfice lui permettra de payer les intérêts de son prêt et investir le reste dans son activité.
 Il compte devenir un grossiste de bonne renommé à fin de satisfaire ses nombreux clients qui ne cessent de croître
texts.en: Ms. Afou was born in 1968 in Karibougou/ Sikasso. She is mother of three children and lives with her spouse in Mandela (the third largest administrative region in Mali). She has been in business for more than six years.  Her experience in this field has earned her a good reputation and she receives orders from various customers.  In order to have the means necessary to satisfy these customers, she decided to work with Soro Yiriwaso, a microfinance institution, two years ago. All her prior loans have been fully repaid.  This new loan will enable her to buy 10 bags of 50kg of fonio and five bags of corn.  She stocks up in the villages surrounding Mandela.  Her sales are usually made to male and female customers on-site and at the Sikasso market.  With this loan, she expects to earn an average monthly profit of 20,000 FCFA.  This profit will allow her to pay the interest on her loan and to invest the rest in her business.  She plans to become a reputable wholesaler in order to satisfy her many clients who continue to grow in number.

loans.use: to buy cereals.

loans.name: Maria Yamileth

texts.es:
María, se decidió por un nuevo préstamo, porque en el mes de fiestas de fin de año, estará mejor la demanda en el negocio, quiere comprarse maíz por mayoreo, cal, para tener en el negocio la materia prima necesaria para seguir en su trabajo. 
El efecto que tuvo con su préstamo anterior fue el crecimiento en sus ventas de tortillas, en su familia no ha enfrentado ninguna circunstancia, su economía ha mejorado.
texts.en:
Maria decided to request a new loan because during the holiday season at the end of the year, her business's demand will be better. She wants to buy corn wholesale and lime so she will have the basic supplies needed for her business, and she can keep working.

The result of her previous loan was that her tortilla sales grew. Her family has not faced any (bad) circumstances, and her economic situation has improved.

loans.use: purchase corn wholesale and lime.

loans.name: Amadou

texts.fr:
Amadou est né en 1962 à Karaguana-Malle/Koutiala. Il vit chez lui avec ses deux femmes et ses 12 enfants à Mandela (troisième région administrative de la république du Mali).
Il mène cette activité depuis de 2 ans. Son expérience dans ce domaine, lui a valu une bonne réputation et reçoit des commandes de divers clients. Ainsi pour avoir les ressources nécessaires afin de satisfaire ces clients, il décida de collaborer avec  Soro Yiriwaso, il ya  2 ans  et les prêts précédents ont été correctement remboursés.  
Ce nouveau prêt lui permettra d’acheter un stock de condiments tel que : Sounbala, lorié, fièfiè, cube maggi, des boites de de concentrées de tomate, de l’oignon et de l’ail. Il  s’approvisionne au marché de Sikasso. Les ventes sont faites à Mandela chez lui et au marché du village. Il se fait aider par ses femmes. Sa clientèle est composée principalement de femmes du village et d’environs. 
Avec ce prêt, Amadou envisage réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 24 500  FCFA par mois. Ce bénéfice lui permettra de payer les intérêts de son prêt et investir le reste dans son activité.
texts.en: Amadou was born in 1962 in Karaguana-Malle/Koutiala. He lives with his two wives and their 12 children in Mandela, the third largest administrative region in Mali.  He has been in business for two years. His experience in this field has given him a good reputation and he receives orders from various customers.  In order to have the means necessary to satisfy these customers, he decided to work with Soro Yiriwaso, a microfinance oragnization, two years ago.  His prior loans have been fully repaid. This new loan will enable him to buy an inventory of condiments such as sounbala, lorie, fiefie, Maggi seasoning, tomato concentrate, onions, and garlic. He stocks up at the Sikasso market. His sales are made in Mandela at his home and at the village market.  He is helped by his wives. His customers consist of mostly women from his village and the surrounding area. With this loan, Amadou expects to earn an average monthly profit of 24,500 FCFA. This profit will allow him to pay the interest on his loan and to invest the rest in his business.

loans.use: to buy condiments

loans.name: Quelita

texts.es:
Quelita, de 55 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora y con muchas ganas de salir adelante, es conviviente con Cesar quien es agricultor, fruto de ésta unión tiene 04 hermosos hijos de 22, 21, 20 y 14 años de edad a quienes quiere mucho, habitando cómodamente  su propia casa.
La actividad que realiza Quelita es la venta de abarrotes para eso cuenta con un bodega instalada en su propia casa, desde donde atiende a su clientes que en su mayoría son sus vecinos, iniciando hace 07 años por la necesidad de contar con un ingreso adicional, contando con un préstamo más un  capital propio fruto de sus ahorros los utilizó para iniciarse en su negocio, logrando hacerlo crecer y contar con más clientes.
Le gusta su negocio pues le permite   estar en casa y contar con la tranquilidad de un ingreso económico, además del tiempo libre que lo puede emplear en otras actividades  y el cuidado de su hogar. Por lo contrario no le gusta cuando sus clientes le solicitan créditos por sus compras pues comenta ya tuvo malas experiencias con este tipo de venta pues no le pagaron los créditos, por eso ahora se niega a realizar este tipo de venta y todo lo vende al contado, y ve que tiene mejores resultados, por eso tiene planes de seguir creciendo y ampliando su negocio.
Por tanto éste será el préstamo número 04 con la institución MFP, se siente agradecida por el apoyo financiero para concretar sus planes. Además de estar a gusto con su banco comunal pues conoce a sus integrantes y los considera ser personas responsables y solidarias.
Con el monto solicitado de 500 nuevos soles lo invertirá en la compra de abarrotes al por mayor buscando los mejores precios y más bajos para así obtener mejores ganancias, además  como juguetes para ésta campaña navideña.
texts.en:
Quelita, who is 55 years old, is a hard working woman with a strong desire to get ahead. She lives with her life partner, Cesar, who is a farmer. She and Cesar have four beautiful children together, who are 22, 21, 20 and 14 years old, whom they love very much. They live comfortably in their own home.  

Quelita runs her own business, which is a small grocery store, located in a room in her home where she attends to her customers, the majority of which are her neighbors. She started this business seven years ago when she was in need of additional income. She used money from a loan, along with personal savings to start her business; she has succeeded in expanding her business and growing her customer base. 

She likes her business because it allows her to be at home and have the peace of mind that the extra income provides, as well as allowing her free time to be able to invest in other activities and take care of her home. However, one thing she doesn't like about her business is when customers ask to purchase goods on credit. She has had bad experiences with this type of sales, when people did not pay what they owed, which is why she no longer sells anything on credit and only does cash sales. She sees that she has had good results, and for this reason she plans on continuing to grow and expand her business. 

This will be the fourth loan she has taken out through MFP. She is thankful for the financial support which allows her to make her plans a reality. She is happy with her communal bank because she knows the other members and considers them to be responsible and supportive. 

With the 500 nuevos soles she has requested she will invest in the purchase of groceries at wholesale price; she will look for the lowest and best prices so that she will have better profit. She will also buy toys for the holiday season.

loans.use: to buy products of basic needs and toys to restock her store.

loans.name: Rebeca Del Socorro

texts.es:
Rebeca es originaria de Managua pero actualmente vive en Granada, de 32 años de edad, casada, madre de 5  hijos, actualmente 3 de ellos están estudiando,  ella de oficio comerciante se dedica a la venta de ropa usada, vende de forma ambulante en Granada, su nivel académico es hasta segundo año de secundaria,  pues su situación económica no le permitió culminar sus estudios. Rebeca inicio su actividad trabajando desde los 20 años de edad ayudándole a su mama ya que ella se dedicaba al mismo negocio, luego se casa decide independizarse y establece su propio  negocio,  el cual lo  administra  con apoyo de  su  mama,  pues su deseo de superación la ayudo a seguir adelante  con apoyo de instituciones financieras decidió invertir nuevamente en el negocio. Hoy en día cuenta  con 5 años  de tener su venta de ropa fija, en su negocio recibe el apoyo de su  esposo, sus productos los comercializa en la ciudad de Granada y  también sale a vender  a  Tipitapa, su expectativa es diversificarse en compra de nuevos productos para su negocio.
En esta ocasión ella esta  solicitando el crédito para comprar  zapatos,  sandalias. Todos los productos mas solicitados por sus clientes, ella estima esta inversión será de ayuda ya que podrá estar preparada para la temporada navideña, aumentan las ventas mejorando a la vez sus ganancias, sus planes futuros es seguir trabajando en su negocio ya que es algo que le gusta hacer y con lo que ha podido salir adelante, sus metas próximas es ampliar su negocio  para mayor atracción de clientes todo con el objetivo de poder salir adelante.
texts.en:
Rebeca is from Managua but currently lives in Granada.  She’s 32-years-old, married and mother of five children three of which are attending school.  She’s a merchant by profession and sells used clothing from place to place in Granada.  She completed second year of secondary school because her economic situation did not allow her to complete her education.  Rebeca started her activity working from the age of 20 helping her mother who was in the same business.  Once she got married she decided to become independent and open her own business which she now runs with her mother’s help.  Her desire for self-improvement helped her to continue forward and with support from financial institutions decided to invest in the business again.  Today, she has five years’ experience selling clothes.  Her husband helps her with the business and she sells her goods in Granada and also in Tipitapa.  She hopes to diversify by purchasing new products for her business.

On this occasion, she’s asking for a loan to buy shoes and sandals which are the goods most requested by her customers.  She feels that this investment will be of great help to her because she’ll be prepared for the Christmas season when sales and profits increase.  Her future plan is to continue working in her business because it’s something she enjoys doing and it’s helped her get ahead.  Her immediate goal is to expand the business to attract more customers aiming at being able to get ahead.

loans.use: to buy shoes and sandals.

loans.name: Betis Carolina

texts.es: Betis de 40 años de edad, casada con 4 hijos menores de edad. De 16, 14, 11,1 años de edad. Todos están estudiando. Ella es originaria de Chinandega, lugar que está ubicado en la zona de occidente del país. Betis es una mujer muy trabajadora, responsables. Tiene por actividad económica la venta de cosméticos de forma ambulante a sus clientes fijos y eventuales. El negocio consisten en la venta de cosméticos de crédito y contado como pinturas labiales, sobre de ojos, rubor, vanidad, perfumen es, lápiz de ojos, base, correctores.  Ella tiene 14 años desempeñando dicha actividad. El objetivo del crédito es invertir en capital de trabajo y surtir su negocio en la compra y venta de cosméticos. Betis agradece la ayuda que los inversionistas kiva les brindan a personas de escasos recursos y países pobre como es Nicaragua para tener un medio de trabajo digno.
texts.en: Betis is 40 years old, and is married with four children, who are 16, 14, 11, and 1 years old. All of them are students (except for the baby). She is originally from Chinandega, a place that is located in the western part of the country. Betis is a very hard-working and responsible woman. She has a traveling business selling cosmetics to both regular and occasional customers. The business consists of both cash and credit sales of cosmetics such as lipsticks, eyeshadow, blush, perfumes, eyeliner pencils, foundations, and concealers. Betis has 14 years of experience in cosmetics sales. The purpose of this loan is to turn it into capital for her business and to stock her business with more cosmetics to sell. Betis is grateful for the support that Kiva lenders provide to people with few resources and to countries as poor as Nicaragua, so that people are able to have honest work.

loans.use: to obtain capital to stock her cosmetics sales business with items such as lipsticks, eyeshadows, blush, perfumes, eyeliner pencils, foundations, and concealers.

loans.name: Cesar Augusto

texts.es: Cesar de 33 años de edad, originario de la Comarca la Condega, Municipio de Estelí, es de oficio comerciante, se dedica al negocio de pulpería, desde hace 5 años, padre de 1 hijo, el cual esta a su cargo. Cesar es  cliente Kiva su primer  crédito lo utilizo para surtir su pulpería de productos como arroz, azúcar, frijoles, aceite, gaseosa, etc...  Este primer  crédito le ayudo ya que pudo surtir  su negocio con productos muy solicitados por sus clientes esta muy agradecido por el apoyo recibido de parte de Kiva. En el negocio recibe el apoyo de su esposa  que le ayuda con la administración. El ahora requiere de su segundo crédito al igual para invertir en su pulpería con mercadería tales como azúcar, jabón, café, galletas, enlatados, huevo, pan, etc. Todos los productos necesarios para surtir aun más el inventario de su negocio. El estima que este préstamo le será de gran ayuda ya que aumentaran sus ventas generándole mejores ingresos que  invertirá en su negocio. Sus planes futuros es ampliar más su negocio hasta convertirlo en una miscelánea para tener un negocio estable que le genere  mejores ganancias y salir adelante con su familia.
texts.en: Cesar is 33, he is from Comarca la Condega, municipality of Esteli, he is a merchant, he owns a general store, a business that he started 5 years ago, he has one child that depends on him.  Cesar is a Kiva client, his first loan was used to stock his store with products such as rice, sugar, beans, oil, soda, etc. This first loan helped him, because he was able to have products requested by his clients, he is very thankful for the support he gets from Kiva.  His wife helps him manage the business.  He now needs a second loan to invest in his store and buy merchandise such as sugar, soap, coffee, cookies, canned goods, eggs, bread, etc.  All the products needed to stock even more his business.  He figures this loan will be very helpful because his sales will increase generating more income that he will then reinvest in his business.  His future plans are to expand the store until it becomes a wholesale supply store and this way have a stable business that generates better profits to get his family ahead.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as sugar, soap, coffee, cookies, canned goods, eggs, bread, etc.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es:
Rosa, de 29 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora y empeñosa, con muchas ganas de salir adelante, es conviviente con Aliardo quien es obrero, fruto de esa unión tiene 02 hermosos hijos de 08 y 02 años de edad, a quienes quiere mucho, habitando cómodamente su propia casa. La actividad que realiza Rosa es la venta de productos de belleza que compra por catálogo y los vende entre sus amistades, familiares y conocidas muchas veces al contado y otras al crédito a 30 días, logrando buenos resultados y conociendo muchas personas, lleva en ese negocio cerca de 11 años realizándola ella sola. Paralelo  a ésta actividad también vende ropas para niños pero de manera ocasional por temporadas como fechas festivas, realizándola también sola, hace 04 años.
En esta actividad puede manejar su tiempo libre para dedicarlos a sus pequeños hijos a quienes quiere mucho y son su motivación para salir adelante, además de los ingresos económicos  que le genera con los cuales puede apoyar a su pareja a pagar los gastos de su hogar. Por lo contrario comenta que le incomoda cuando sus clientes se retrasan en el pago de sus créditos, pero eso no la desanima y tiene planes de seguir trabajando ya que se siente bien y conforme con su negocio, pues le da la independencia que ella necesita. Por tanto éste será el préstamo número 02 con la institución MFP, se siente agradecida con la oportunidad de contar con un línea de crédito para avanzar con su negocio, además comenta sentirse e a gusto con banco comunal pues considera a sus miembros ser personas responsables y amables.
Con el monto solicitado de 600 nuevos soles los invertirá en la compra de ropas de niños de diversos modelos y marcas, pesando en esta campaña navideña ya cuenta con pedidos por entregar.
texts.en:
Rosa is 29 years old and is a hardworking and dedicated woman with a great desire to get ahead.  She lives with Aliardo, who is a laborer and they have two children, ages 8 and 2, whom they love very much; they all live comfortably in a home of their own.  Rosa sells beauty products.  She buys from a catalog and sells to her friends, family, and acquaintances, mostly for cash but sometimes for 30 days credit.  This gives her good results and allows her to meet many people.  She has been in this business for almost 11 years and has been doing it alone.  At the same time she also sells children’s clothing, but only on occasion, such as during celebration times.  She also does this alone and has been doing it for four years.

This business allows her to manage her free time to dedicate it to her children, whom she loves very much and are her motivation for getting ahead.  This also provides her with income that she can use to help her husband meet the household expenses.  On the flip side she says that it bothers her when her customers fall behind in their payments, but this does not discourage her and she has plans to keep working since she is comfortable in her business; it gives her the independence she needs.  This will be her second loan through MFP and she is grateful for the opportunity to have this line of credit to move her business forward.  She also says that she likes the communal bank because all the members are responsible and friendly.

She will use the 600 PEN from this loan to buy children’s clothing of different brands and styles for the holiday season; she has orders to deliver.

loans.use: to buy children's clothing.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es:
Rosa, de 34 años de edad, es una mujer luchadora y trabajadora, además de ser amable y cordial en su trato con las personas. Es conviviente con José quien es empleado y padre de sus 02  hijos de 12 y 10 años de edad respectivamente. Juntos habitan en su casa propia. La actividad que realiza Rosa es la venta de comidas como tallarines, estofados, juanes  y refrescos por las mañanas en un puesto en el mercado de la ciudad, donde atiende cordialmente a sus clientes quienes la visitan a diario por la buena sazón en sus preparaciones.
Se inició hace más de 05 años, por iniciativa y capital propio. Hasta el momento lo viene realizando con el apoyo de su hermana con quien comparte las ganancias.
Considera su negocio rentable por las buenas ganancias que le deja y le has servido para salir de muchos apuros, además de conseguir terminar todo lo que prepara para la venta y si en caso sobra le sirve de alimento en su casa, de esa manera no se desperdicia nada.
Decidió a empezar con su negocio por el deseo de contar con sus propios ingresos y no depender únicamente de su pareja, quería bien apoyarlo con los gastos del hogar y brindar una mejor calidad de vida a su familia, sabiendo que con el apoyo mutuo saldrán  adelante más fácilmente. Viendo los buenos resultados que tiene, está ahorrando sus ganancias pues desea en un futuro abrir una bodega de abarrotes en su casa, para así estar más cerca de sus hijos durante el día. Por tanto éste será el préstamo número 01  con la institución MFP. Está agradecida y contenta de saber que contara con un apoyo financiero para realizar sus planes. Por eso se compromete a  cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas como en créditos anteriores. 
Con el monto solicitado de 800 nuevos soles, los invertirá en la compra de los ingredientes necesarios para la preparación de sus alimentos como arroz, azúcar, aceites y otros. Buscará preciso bajos por sus compras en volumen, así tendrá mayores ganancias.
texts.en:
Rosa is 34 years old and a hard-working, determined woman; besides being warm and friendly in the way she treats people. She lives with her partner, José, who is an employee and the father of their two children, ages 12 and 10. Together they live in their own home. 

Rosa's work is selling food such as noodles, stews, juanes (rice and chicken wrapped in a banana leaf), and soft drinks. She sells in the mornings at a stand in the city market, where in a friendly way she serves the customers who visit her daily because of the good flavor of her dishes.

She started more than five years ago through her own initiative and with her own capital. Up to now she has been carrying on the business with her sister's help, with whom she shares the profits. She considers her business profitable because of the good earnings it produces, and it has helped her get out of many a tight spot. She manages to finish everything she prepares for sale, and if anything is left over, she uses it as food in her home, so that nothing is wasted.

She decided to start her business because of the wish to have her own income and not depend solely on her partner. She wanted to help him with the household expenses and provide her family with a better quality of life, knowing that by supporting one another it will be easier for them to get ahead in life.

Seeing the good results she has, she is saving her earnings as she wishes to open a grocery store in their home someday. This is so that she can be closer to her children during the day. Therefore this will be her first loan with the MFP institution. She is grateful and happy to know she will have the financial assistance to carry out her plans. That is why she promises to make her installment payments, as in previous loans. 

With the amount applied for a 800 nuevos soles, she will invest in the purchase of the necessary ingredients for making her food, such as rice, sugar, cooking oil and other items. She will seek low prices for her bulk purchases and will have greater earnings this way.

loans.use: To buy rice, sugar, cooking oil and other items.

loans.name: Jessica

texts.es:
Jessica, de 29 años de edad, es una mujer con muchas ganas de salir adelante, tiene muchas ideas que desea realizar. Es conviviente con Luís quien es comerciante y padre de su hija de 2 años de edad y desea brindarle una mejor calidad de vida. Juntos habitan su propia casa que compraron con mucho esfuerzo. La actividad que realiza Jessica es la venta de bebidas gaseosas de diversos sabores  y marcas, para eso cuenta con una refrigeradora donde guarda sus productos a temperaturas heladas al gusto de sus clientes por lo caluroso de la zona. Atiende a sus clientes muy amablemente desde su casa. Iniciándose hace más de 02 años, comprando en pocas cantidades con su propio capital, y viendo la buena acogida que tuvo su negocio se decidió continuar y hasta el momento se dedica  sola. 
Considera a su negocio bastante rentable por las buenas ganancias que le deja. Antes tenía problemas económicos ya que los ingresos de su pareja no les alcanzaban y con la llegada de su hija los gastos aumentaron, tomando la decisión de iniciar su negocio, que ahora le saca de los apuros económicos.
Viendo los buenos resultados y la acogida que continúa teniendo su negocio tiene planes de aumentar el stock de sus mercaderías y así ver crecer su negocio y con las ganancias incursionar en otro negocio de carpintería en sociedad con su pareja que cuenta con los conocimientos necesarios para éste rubro. Este será el préstamo número 03 con la institución MFP. Se siente contenta de saber que contará con una línea de crédito para avanzar con su negocio. Por eso se compromete a ser responsable con el pago de sus cuotas para tener acceso a más créditos en el futuro. Además de gustarle el trabajo de su banco comunal pues lo considera un grupo responsable  y unido.
Con el monto solicitado de 1500 nuevos soles, los invertirá en compra de más mercaderías para su negocio como bebidas gaseosas de diversos sabores, aumentando el stock disponible para la venta, buscando precios más cómodos por sus compras en volumen.
texts.en:
Jessica, who is 29 years old, is a woman who truly wants to succeed, and she has many goals that she wants to accomplish. She is married to Luis, who is a businessman and father to her two-year-old daughter. He wants to give her a better quality of life. Together, they live in their own home that they worked hard to buy.

Jessica sells soda in a variety of flavors and brands. She uses a refrigerator where she stores her products at chilly temperatures, which is what her customers like because the area is warm. She serves her customers in a very friendly way from her home. She started her business more than two years ago, purchasing stock in small amounts with her own money. Seeing the good reception her business was getting, she decided to continue, and, until now, she has worked alone.

She feels her business is fairly successful because of the good income it gives her. Before, she had financial troubles because her husband's earnings were not enough, and with the arrival of her daughter, their expenses increased. Jessica decided to start her business, which now helps her through tough economic times.

Seeing the good results and the reception that she continues to have, Jessica plans to increase her stock and grow her business with the money she will earn through the carpentry business that she has with her husband. (Through that same business), she has the know-how for this task. This will be her third loan with Kiva partner MFP. She is pleased to know that she can count on this line of credit to grow. She likes working with her communal bank because she considers the group responsible and united.

With the money requested, 1,500 nuevos soles, she will purchase more merchandise for her business, such as soda in a variety of flavors, growing her stock available for sale, and looking for more precious commodities to purchase in volume.

loans.use: purchase soda in a variety of flavors.

loans.name: Felix Raul

texts.es:
El señor Félix  de 55 años de edad, es originario de Condega, Municipio de Estelí, casado, padre de 3 hijos mayores de edad, de oficio comerciante se dedica al negocio de taller de mecánico en general, desde hace 13 años, su nivel académico es hasta primer año de secundaria, Félix inicio su actividad laboral  desde muy pequeño trabajando en un taller de mecánica a otras personas, luego fue de haber obtenido experiencia y total dominio en el negocio, decide poner su propio negocio de taller de mecánica en general en su casa de habitación, se siente satisfecho con su negocio el cual le ha generado muchas ganancias, en su actividad paga mano de obra , este ha sido su primer negocio, ya que cuenta con el apoyo de su hijo mayor.
Solicita el crédito para un manometro y herramientas tales como llaves , gata hidraulica, tuercas etc. El cual será de ayuda pues con la compra del motor podrá   entregar su trabajo en tiempo y forma, sus planes futuros es mas tierra para  ampliar el área del negocio  para mayor atracción de los clientes con el objetivo de generar mas ingresos, sus metas próximas es llegar a comprar mas herramientas para mejorar la infraestructura del negocio, ya que su deseo es tener una mejor vida y poder salir adelante con su familia.
texts.en:
Félix is 55 years old and is from Condega in the municipality of Estelí. He is married, is the father of three grown children, and has been working as a general mechanic for the past 13 years. He only went to school through his first year of secondary school, then began to work from a very young age in a mechanic's shop. After he had obtained sufficient experience and had mastered his trade, he decided to start running his own mechanic's shop out of his home. He feels satisfied with his business, which has generated a lot of income. This has been his first business, and he now counts upon the help of his eldest son. 

He is applying for a loan to buy a pressure gauge and other tools such as wrenches, a hydraulic jack, nuts and bolts, etc. It would be of great help because with the purchase of such items he could complete his tasks on time and in good condition. 

His future plans include acquiring more land to increase the size of his business in order to attract more customers, with the objective of creating more income. His goals are to buy more tools to improve the infrastructure of his business, and his desire is to have a better life and to improve his family's situation.

loans.use: to buy a pressure gauge and tools.

loans.name: Rosa Imelda

texts.en:
Rosa is a mother of three, who has run her family’s store for many years. She has enjoyed being a shopkeeper, because she likes interacting with her neighbors. About a year ago, she decided she needed to try and modernize her business. At that time, she was using only a notebook to register sales and purchases, and she found it impossible to calculate her profits accurately.

With Tiendatek, Rosa says she now better understands her business and consequently makes better decisions on everything, from knowing which products to order, to which suppliers to work with. Rosa thinks that, thanks to her hard work, love of sales, and Tiendatek, she can grow a successful business.

loans.use: to pay for a Tiendatek device to better manage her store through inventory control and performance reports

loans.name: Earl

texts.en:
Earl shared that he started San Diego Pest Solutions in 2008 “with a prayer and three initial customers”. With over 10 years of experience working for other pest control companies, Earl knew he had the expertise to launch out on his own after he lost his job in the last economic recession.

San Diego Pest Solutions helps customers maintain a pest free environment.  One of the most rewarding aspects of the work for Earl is helping people protect their families by keeping their homes free of insects and rodents that cause such problems as asthma, allergies, and other harmful illnesses.  With his customer-first attitude, Earl has succeeded in attracting a loyal client base and built a profitable business that is poised for greater expansion.

Earl will use his Kiva loan to invest in new pest control equipment, as well as to upgrade his computer and software to be better able to track clients and services. These investments into his business will allow him to continue expanding.  

His dream is to eventually grow to the point where he can create much-needed jobs for the community.

Find San Diego Pest Solutions on the web at http://sandiegopestsolutions.com

video.title: Kiva Borrower Ralph from United States

loans.use: to invest in new pest control equipment, a computer and software

loans.name: Fidele Rosaline

texts.fr: Fidèle est une jeune camerounaise de 24 ans, célibataire et mère d'une fille de 5 ans qui va à l'école. Elle possède et gère un kiosque dans un coin de la ville depuis 6 an où elle vend des crédits de communications, biscuits, friandises, . Dynamique et accueillant, elle considère que son stock de crédits est déjà insuffisant pour sa clientèle grandissante. le crédit qu'elle sollicite lui permettra d'acheter le crédit de communication en gros auprès de fournisseurs (grossistes d'Orange et de MTN). Les bénéfices escomptés vont lui permettra d'augmenter son capital et avoir un mini kiosque d'une part et de subvenir aux besoins de sa famille d'autre part.
texts.en: Fidèle is a young 24-year old Cameroonian. She is the single mother of a 5-year old girl who attends school. She has owned and run a kiosk in a part of the city for six years. She sells phone credit, cookies, and candy.  Dynamic and welcoming, she thinks that her inventory of phone cards is already insufficient for her growing number of customers.  The loan she is requesting will enable her to buy phone credit wholesale from suppliers (wholesalers of Orange and MTN, two local phone companies). The expected profits will enable her to increase her capital and to have a mini-kiosk as well as take care of the needs of her family.

loans.use: to buy phone credit.

loans.name: Domitila

texts.es:
Domitila, de 48 años es una mujer trabajadora. Vive en compañía de sus hijos a los que quiere mucho y cuida en la casa que adquirió hace algunos años. Proviene de una familia agrícola y ganadera,  todas estas lecciones de vida han hecho de ella una agricultora eficiente. Siembra papa, maíz y verduras, así mismo cría vacas y cultiva la alfalfa, años tras años gracias a esta actividad ella puede sostener a su familia y ser una protagonista en su manutención junto a su esposo que ahora también la apoya en estas actividades.  Ahora se centra en la siembra de espinaca y zanahoria como también espera la cosecha de papa y maíz. Todas estas actividades las realiza por el bien de sus 3 hijos que la motivan a seguir adelante. Su anhelo es darles lo mejor para que lleguen a superarse estudiando. Este es el octavo crédito con MFP, se siente feliz, pues tiene el capital necesario para mejorar su negocio y por ende su calidad de vida. Además le gusta pertenecer a su asociación, porque sus integrantes son personas solidarias y trabajadoras.
Domitila, invertirá el dinero en la compra de abono orgánico para su próxima siembra.
texts.en:
Domitila is 48 years old and a hardworking woman.  She lives with her children, whom she loves very much and cares for in the home she acquired a few years ago.  She comes from an agricultural family and all of these life’s lessons have made her an efficient farmer.  She raises potatoes, corn and vegetables.  She also raises cattle and grows alfalfa.  Thanks to these activities she has been able to support her family over the years and be instrumental to their sustainment, alongside her husband who also supports her in these activities.

Now she is focused on planting spinach and carrots and is also waiting for her potato and corn crop.  She does all of this for her three children’s wellbeing and wants to provide the best for them so that they can successful in school.  This will be her eighth loan through MFP and she is happy because this will provide the capital so that she can improve her business and quality of life.  She also likes being a member of the group because the members are all united, hardworking people.

Domitila will use the money from this loan to buy compost for her next crop.

loans.use: to buy compost.

loans.name: Diarra

texts.fr: Diarra est une femme mariée depuis plus de 30 ans. Elle est mère de cinq enfants dont deux filles déjà mariées.Elle vit avec se enfants et ses petits fils dans la même maison.Son activité lui permet de soutenir ses enfants dans la prise en charge des dépenses d'entretien de cette grande famille. Afin de renforcer son fonds de commerce, elle sollicite un pret de 150000f pour acheter des ustensiles de cuisine.
texts.en: Diarra is a woman who has been married for over 30 years. She is mother of five children; two daughters are already married. She lives with her children and her grandsons in the same house. Her business enables her to support her children by taking care of the household expenses of her large family.  In order to strengthen her business, she is asking for a loan of 150,000 francs to buy kitchen utensils.

loans.use: to buy kitchen utensils.

loans.name: Sitan

texts.fr:
Mme SITAN est né en 1965 à MANDELA/SIKASSO, elle est mère de 4 enfants  et vit chez son époux à Mandela (troisième région administrative de la république du Mali).
Elle mène cette activité commerciale depuis plus de 6 ans. Son expérience dans ce domaine, lui a valu une bonne réputation et reçoit des commandes de divers clients. Ainsi pour avoir les ressources nécessaires afin de satisfaire ces clients, elle décida de collaborer avec Soro Yiriwaso, il ya 2 ans maintenant, les prêts antérieurs ont été correctement remboursés.  
Ce nouveau prêt lui permettra d’acheter 10 sacs de 50 kg de fonio et  5 sacs de maïs. Elle s’approvisionne dans les villages environnent de Mandela. Les ventes sont généralement faites à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes sur place et au marché de Sikasso. 
Avec ce prêt, elle envisage réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 20 000 FCFA par mois. Ce bénéfice lui permettra de payer les intérêts de son prêt et investir le reste dans son activité.
texts.en: Ms. Sitan was born in 1965 in Mandela, Sikasso. She is mother of four children and lives with her spouse in Mandela (third largest administrative region in Mali).  She has been in business for over six years.  Her experience in this field has given her a good reputation and she receives orders from various clients.  In order to have sufficient resources to satisfy customer demand, she decided to work with Soro Yiriwaso two years ago.  Her prior loans have all been fully repaid.  This new loan will enable her to buy 10 bags of 50 kg of fonio and five bags of corn.  She stocks up in the villages surrounding Mandela.  Her sales are generally made to a clientele consisting of men and women on-site and at the Sikasso market.  With this loan, she expects to earn an average monthly profit of 20,000 FCFA.  This profit will enable her to pay the interest on her loan and to invest the rest in her business.

loans.use: to buy cereals.

loans.name: Carmen

texts.es:
Carmen, de 51 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora y empeñosa, además de tener muchas ganas de sobresalir, es separada, vive en compañía de sus dos hijos mayores de 30 y 27 años de edad, habitando su propia casa.
La actividad que realiza Carmen es la repostería, oficio que aprendió estudiando en un centro de educación ocupacional, donde le enseñaron a elaborar deliciosas tortas, y pasteles para promociones, bodas y demás acontecimientos sociales, llegando a tener muchos pedidos por el buen trabajo que realiza, y continua actualizándose pues considera que siempre  hay cosas nuevas que  aprender, contando con un horno en su casa, donde realiza todos su preparaciones y atiende a sus clientes desde hace 23 años. Le gusta  la repostería así como las manualidades, se siente a gusto con su oficio pues le ha proporcionado muchas satisfacciones, como los ingresos económicos y el poder convertirse  en una prospera empresaria, por eso tiene planes de abrir una fuente de soda en su casa, ya que su ubicación en una esquina es estratégica para un buen negocio. Por tanto éste será el préstamo número 04 con la institución MFP, se siente contenta con el apoyo financiero para avanzar con su negocio. Además de sentirse a gusto con su banco comunal pues considera a sus miembros ser buenas personas.
Con el monto solicitado de 600 nuevos soles los invertirá en compra de ingredientes para la preparaciones de sus torta para esta campaña de de promociones de los colegios. También en moldes y utensilios de repostería.
texts.en:
Carmen, 51 years old, is a hardworking and diligent woman, in addition to wanting very much to excel. She is separated, and lives in the company of her two older children, 30 and 27 years old, living in her own home.

The activity that Carmen performs is the confectionery trade, a trade that she learned while studying in an occupational education center where thy taught her to prepare delicious cakes and pastries for graduations, weddings, and other social events. She is starting to have many orders because of the good work that she does, and she continues to update herself since she believes that there are always new things to learn. She has an oven in her home, where she has made all of her preparations and she has taken care of her customers for 23 years. She enjoys confectionery as much as handicrafts. She feels comfortable with her profession since it has provided her a lot of satisfaction, like an economic income and the power to become a thriving entrepreneur. Because of this she has plans to open a soda fountain in her house, since its location on a street corner is strategic for a good business. Therefore, this will be loan number four with the institution MFP. She is pleased with the financial support to advance her business. In addition to feeling comfortable with her communal bank, she also considers its members to be good people.

With the amount of 600 Nuevos Soles requested, she will invest in the purchase of ingredients for the preparation of her cake for this season of school graduations, and also in pastry molds and utensils.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for the preparations of her cakes, like molds and utensils.

loans.name: Maminata

texts.fr:
Maminata est en 1955 à COULIBALYBOUGOU. Mère de 6 enfants elle vit chez son époux à COULIBALYBOUGOU (troisième région administrative de la république du Mali).
Elle mène cette activité de commerciale depuis plus de 6 ans. Son expérience dans ce domaine, lui a valu une bonne réputation et reçoit des commandes de divers clients. Ainsi pour avoir les ressources nécessaires afin de satisfaire ces clients, elle a décidé de  collaborer avec Soro Yiriwaso, il ya 3 ans  et  les prêts antérieurs ont été correctement remboursés.  
Ce nouveau prêt lui permettra d’acheter environs 35 sacs de maïs. Elle s’approvisionne dans les villages environnants de Coulibalybougou. Les ventes sont  faites à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes sur place et au marché de Sikasso. 
Avec ce prêt, elle envisage réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 30 000 FCFA par mois. Ce bénéfice lui permettra de payer les intérêts de son prêt et investir le reste dans son activité.
texts.en: Maminata was born in 1955 in Coulibalybougou. She is mother of six children and lives with her spouse in Coulibalybougou (third largest administrative region in Mali). She has been in business for over six years. Her experience in this field has given her a good reputation and she receives orders from various customers. In order to have sufficient resources to satisfy customer demand, she decided to work with Soro Yiriwaso three years ago. Her prior loans have all been fully repaid. This new loan will enable her to buy 35 bags of corn. She stocks up in the villages surrounding Coulibalybougou. Her sales are made to a clientele consisting of men and women, on-site and at the Sikasso market. With this loan, she expects to earn an average monthly profit of 30,000 FCFA. This profit will enable her to pay the interest on her loan and to invest the rest in her business.

loans.use: to buy cereals.

loans.name: Delicia

texts.es:
Delicia, de 38 años de edad, es una mujer alegre y amable, además de ser trabajadora y decidida. Es conviviente con Jorge quien es comerciante. Juntos habitan cómodamente su propia casa que compraron con mucho esfuerzo y en compañía de una sobrina que cuidan y apoyan con los gatos de sus estudios. La actividad que realiza Delicia es la venta de ropas de damas, caballeros y niños, siendo de diversos modelos y a la moda, estos productos se los envía una amiga desde la capital. También se dedica a la venta de abarrotes en general,  contando con una bodega que acondicionó en su casa, donde atiende muy amablemente a sus clientes y aprovecha en ofertarles las ropas que tiene disponible para la venta. Tiene más de 03 años dedicándose a ambos negocios, iniciándose con un capital propio y comprando en pequeñas cantidades, viendo los buenos resultados de decidió continuar, ahora ocasionalmente necesita el apoyo de una ayudante a quien paga por día trabajado.
Considera a sus negocios bastante rentables por las ganancias que le deja. 
Se inició en ambos negocios debido a la necesidad de contar con una ocupación y apoyar a su pareja con los gastos de su hogar, además de poder sentirse una persona productiva e independiente. Viendo los buenos resultados, tiene planes de continuar y aumentar el stock de sus mercaderías, así verá crecer su negocio. Por tanto éste será el préstamo número 08 con la institución MFP. Está contenta de saber que podrá tener acceso a una línea de crédito para continuar con su negocio, por tanto se compromete a ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas, como en créditos anteriores, para tener un buen record crediticio y seguir contando con éste apoyo. Por otro lado, comenta que le gusta el trabajo de su banco comunal pues los considera un grupo unido y solidario.
Con el monto solicitado de 1000 nuevos soles, lo invertirá en la compra de mercadería para su negocio como ropas variadas de diversos modelos, también abarrotes para surtir su bodega. Buscará precios más cómodos por el volumen de la compra de toda esa mercadería, entonces tendrá mayores márgenes de ganancias.
texts.en:
Delicia, 38 years old, is a cheerful and friendly woman, in addition to being hard-working and determined. She lives together with Jorge, who is a merchant. Together they live comfortably in their own house, which they bought with great effort, and in the company of a niece whom they take care of and support with the expenses of her studies. The work that Delicia does is selling clothing for men, women and children, of various styles and in fashion. These products are sent to her by a friend from the capital. She also dedicates herself to selling general groceries; she has a store which she set up in her home, where she provides very friendly service to her customers, and also takes advantage of the opportunity to offer them the clothing that she has available for sale. She has dedicated herself to both businesses for more than 3 years; she started out by using her own capital and buying in small quantities. Seeing the good results, she decided to continue. Now, she occasionally needs the support of an assistant, whom she pays for each day worked. 

She considers both businesses quite profitable thanks to the earnings they provide her. She started in both businesses due to the need to have an occupation and help her partner with the household expenses, and in order to feel like a productive and independent person. Seeing the good results, she plans to continue and to increase her stocks of merchandise, thus seeing her business grow. Accordingly, this will be loan number 8 for her with the MFP institution. She is happy to know that she can have access to a line of credit to continue with her business, and accordingly she is committed to being punctual in making her loan payments, as with previous loans, in order to have a good credit record and continue having access to this support. At the same time, she comments that she likes the work of her communal bank, since she considers it a united group with a sense of solidarity. 

With the amount requested, 1000 new soles, she will invest in buying merchandise for her business, such as a variety of clothing in diverse styles, as well as groceries to stock her store. She will seek to buy all of this merchandise at lower prices due to the volume purchased, and thus she will have larger profit margins.

loans.use: to buy clothing to sell and grocery products to stock her store.

loans.name: Rosa Emilia

texts.es:
Rosa, se ha decidido por un nuevo préstamo, se comprara semillas de marañón, por mayoreo, esto le permitirá a que Rosa mantenga la suficiente cantidad en su inventario para seguir procesándola para la venta.

Ella considera que con el préstamo anterior tuvo un efecto positivo, se compro mercadería para almacenar y vendió a mejor precio, generando más ganancias, las circunstancias en su familia son mejores, ya que tiene un mejor ambiente.
texts.en:
Rosa, who has decided to take out a new loan, will buy cashew nuts in bulk. This will allow her to maintain a sufficient quantity in her inventory to continue processing them for sale.

She believes that the last loan had a positive effect. She bought merchandise to stock and sell at a better price, generating more earnings. Her family´s circumstances are better now that they have a better environment.

loans.use: to purchase cashew nuts.

loans.name: Arminita

texts.es:
Arminita de 37 años de edad, es una mujer emprendedora, carismática, con ganas de superación.   Es viuda y tiene 03 hijos de 25, 23 y 18 años de edad a quienes quiere mucho y son su inspiración para seguir adelante. Viven en su casa propia lo cual lo construyo con el apoyo de su pareja. El trabajo que realiza Arminita es la venta de ropas de segundo uso para damas, caballeros y niños, para toda ocasión, la  cual lo realiza en un local en el interior de su casa propia y un puesto en el mercado, siendo muy solicitada por los vecinos de la zona, amistades y familiares por su trato amable y cordial al momento a tender, y la calidad de sus prendas. Toda su mercadería los compra en la capital. Esta actividad  empezó con su propio capital.  Este trabajo lo viene realizando  sola hace más de  08 años tiempo en el cual llegó a hacerse conocida, logrando hacer crecer su cartera de clientes habituales y hasta el momento le viene apoyando sus hija.
Asimismo, considera su negocio bastante rentable por las ganancias que le deja y la demanda de sus productos, llegando a vender todo lo que tiene disponible. 
Por otro lado, comenta que se inició en éste negocio por el deseo de contar con un ingreso propio, sentirse independiente y no depender de los ingresos de su pareja, así como el poder apoyarlo con los gastos del hogar. Logrando buenos resultados, espera que su negocio crezca y con las ganancias abrir una bodega de abarrotes en su casa. Por tanto éste será el préstamo número 10 con la institución MFP. Comenta estar agradecida con la oportunidad de contar con una línea de crédito para concretar sus planes. Se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas con lo ha venido haciendo en los créditos anteriores, así tener un buen record crediticio y acceso a más créditos en el futuro
Con el monto solicitado de 1000 nuevos soles lo invertirá en su totalidad en la compra de su mercadería, como ropas de segundo uso de diversas tallas y modelos, para damas, caballeros y niños. Toda está mercadería la comprará en volumen, buscando precios bajos por sus compras, de esa manera tendrá mayores ganancias.
texts.en:
Arminita, 37 years old, is an enterprising and charismatic woman who has a desire for self-improvement. She is a widow and has three children, 25, 23, and 18 years old, who she loves very much and are her inspiration to keep going. They live in their own home which they constructed with the support of her partner. The work that Arminita does is the sale of second-hand clothing for women, men, and children, for every occasion, which she carries out in a store inside her own house and a stand in the market. She is very much in demand with her neighbors, friends, and family members for her kind and cordial manner when she tends to them and the quality of her garments. She buys all of her merchandise in the capital. She began her work with her own capital. She has performed this work alone for more than eight years’ time during which time she became well-known, managing to make her portfolio of regular customers grow. So far, her daughter has supported her.

Also, she considers her business fairly profitable because of the profits that are left to her and the demand for her products, managing to sell everything that she has available.

On the other hand, she says that she began in this business because of her desire to count on income of her own, to feel independent, and to not depend on the income of her partner, as well as to have the power to support him with the household expenses. Achieving good results, she hopes that her business grows and with the profits opens a convenience store in her home. Therefore, this will be loan number ten with the institution MFP. She says that she is thankful for the opportunity to have a line of credit to realize her plans. She promises to fulfill her payments as she has in previous loans, and therefore have a good credit record and access to more loans in the future.
She will invest the full amount requested of 1000 Nuevos Soles in the purchase of her merchandise, like second-hand clothing in a variety of sizes and models, for women, men, and children. All of this merchandise will be bought in large quantities, looking for low prices for her purchases. That way, she will have larger profits.

loans.use: to buy second-hand clothes in a variety of sizes and models, for women, men, and children.

loans.name: Apolinaria

texts.es:
Apolinaria, necesita un nuevo financiamiento para el negocio de las tortillas y tamales, adquiriendo maíz y leña para el negocio, tambien algunos condimentos que son necesarios para ella continúe en el negocio.

Con el préstamo anterior le permitió comprar materiales para su negocio y alcanzo otra parte para pintar su casa, actualmente está bien en su vivienda, su negocio es estable, siempre preparando cualquier tipo de productos para la venta.
texts.en:
Apolinaria needs new financing for her tortilla and tamale business in order to aquire corn and wood. She also needs some condiments which are necessary for her to continue the business.

The past loan allowed her to buy materials for her business and manage to paint another part of her house. Her home is currently doing well, her business is stable, and she is always preparing any type of products for sale.

loans.use: to purchase corn and firewood.

loans.name: Hilma

texts.es:
Hilma, de 42 años de edad, es una mujer soñadora y entusiasta, con muchas ganas de progresar y brindar una mejor calidad de vida a su familia. Está casada con Isaac quien se empleado  contando con ingreso fijo y padre de sus 3 hijos de 14, 08 y 04 años de edad a quienes quiere mucho. Juntos están cómodamente instados en su propia casa que construyeron con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación.
La actividad que realiza Hilma es la venta de productos de belleza femeninos como maquillajes, tintes, esmaltes, labiales, perfumes y otros. Todos estos productos son comprados por catálogo y vendidos desde su casa entre sus familiares, amistades y vecinos, también hace entregas a domicilio. Se diferencia por el trato amable y cordial que tiene con sus clientes quienes quedan satisfechos, y ellos la recomiendan con otras personas que con el tiempo se vuelven sus clientes habituales. Iniciándose hace más de 04 años, y hasta el momento lo realiza sola, tanto en la venta como en la cobranza de los créditos otorgados..
Considera a su negocio bastante rentable por las buenas ganancias que le deja y la regular cliente que ha sabido ganarse.
No tenía problema económicos antes de iniciar su negocio, pero se decidió aventurarse en su negocio para tener una ocupación en su tiempo libre y el desea de sentirse una prospera empresaria independiente. Ahora viendo los buenos resultados,  espera aumentar el stock de sus productos y ver crecer su negocio. Por tanto éste será el préstamo número 08 con la institución MFP. Está contenta de saber que tendrá el apoyo financiero para continuar con sus planes. Por eso se compromete a ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas como en créditos anteriores. Además comenta estar a gusto con su banco comunal pues conoce a sus integrantes y los considera ser personas amables y solidarias.
Con el monto solicitado de 1200 nuevos soles, lo invertirá en compra de mercaderías para aumentar su  stock disponible para la venta, buscando precios bajos por sus compras en volumen, así tendrá mayores ganancias.
texts.en:
Hilma, 42 years old, is an enthusiastic dreamer who is eager to succeed and provide a better standard of living for her family. She is married to Isaac, who is employed and has a fixed income. She and Isaac have three children, ages 14, 8 and 4, whom they love very much. They live comfortably in their own home, which they built with much effort and dedication.

Hilma has a business selling beauty products, such as makeup, dyes, nail polish, lipsticks, perfumes and other items. She buys all these products by catalog and sells them from her home to relatives, friends and neighbors. She also makes home deliveries. She stands out because of her friendly and cordial demeanor and her customers’ satisfaction. Her clients recommend her to others who, over time, become regular customers themselves. She began her business more than four years ago and she has worked alone until now, both selling her wares and collecting the payments due on the credit extended.

She feels her business is quite profitable because of the good income she earns and the regular clientele she attracts.

She did not have financial problems before starting her business; however she decided to venture into business in order to have an occupation in her spare time. She also wanted to become a prosperous, independent businesswoman. Now, seeing the good results, she hopes to increase her inventory and see her business grow. Consequently this will be loan number 8 with MFP. 

Hilma is pleased to know she will have the financial support to continue with her plans. She is committed to making her payments on time, just as she did on former loans. In addition, she is happy with her communal bank since she knows all the members and considers them to be friendly and supportive people.

With the funds requested, S/. 1,200, she will purchase merchandise to expand the products she has available for sale. She will thus earn more profits because she will be able to buy in larger quantities and pay lower prices.

loans.use: to purchase makeup and hair care products.

loans.name: Arianna Yolibeth

texts.es: Arianna, originaria de Esteli, dueña de un pequeño cyber cafe. Dice que su primera experiencia con el prestamo Kiva le permitio a ella cambiar los monitores viejos que tenia comprar mouses, teclados. Siempre con el obejetivo de mejorar la calidad de su servicio con sus  clientes. Su meta siempre es ir ampliando un poco mas el cyber cafe. En esta ocasion solicita el financiamiento para comprar una impresora pues no tenia ese servicio de impresion.Poco a poco quiere hacer mas sostenible su pequeño negocio y mejorar la calidad de vida.
texts.en: Arianna, originally from Esteli, is the owner of a small cybercafe. She says that her first experience with the Kiva loan permitted her to replace the old monitors that she had and to buy mouses and keyboards. On this occasion, she is requesting the loan to buy a printer, since she has not previously offered printing service. Little by little, she wants to make her small business more sustainable and improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a printer.

loans.name: Cesar

texts.es: Cesar, de 54 años. Es un hombre sincero, su virtud es responsable y honrada. Vive en compañía de Maritza, su esposa desde hace 22 años. Ambos tienen 4 hijos, a los que criaron con mucho amor en su casa propia. Ahora solo viven con una de ellas Maricruz. En todos estos años, edificó muchas actividades. Una de ellas es el oficio de albañil en la capital, de donde obtiene la mayor cantidad de ingresos económicos para mantener a su familia, la otra actividad es la siembra de productos como maíz, olluco, quinua y trigo en terrenos alquilados y con socios, los que después de cada cosecha los comercializa a la ciudad de Lima, donde obtiene buenos ingresos, a raíz de ello se le ocurrió, vender granos verdes. Junto a sus hijos comenzaron el negocio que con el tiempo, fue muy rentable. Ahora tiene un capital fijo para ese negocio y está seguro de incrementarlo. Pero la actividad que le gusta más es la crianza de animales, cuanta con vacas, toros y chivos; los cuales cuida con mucha dedicación y cuando tiene algún apuros económico los vende al carnicero que le ofrezca un mejor precio. Él pertenece al banco comunal “pampa blanca” y este es el crédito número 11 con MFP, donde se siente feliz, ya que tiene muchos años trabajando con su asociación, donde los integrantes son personas, humanas y sobre todo con muchas ganas de ayudarse entre ellos. César, invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de abono orgánico para  sus próximos sembríos.
texts.en:
Cesar is 54 years old and is a sincere man of virtue; he is responsible and honest and lives with his wife of 22 years, Maritza.  They have four children, whom they raised with lots of love in their own home.  Now only one of their daughters, Mariacruz, still lives with them.  [Cesar] has done many things over the years; among them he has worked as a mason in the capital city, where he has a good income that allowed him to support his family.  The other activity was the raising of crops such as corn, ulluco, quinine, and wheat with partners on rented land.  He then sells the harvests in Lima, where he obtains a good income.  He also came up with the idea of selling green grains, so he and his children started this business and it’s been profitable.  Now he has some fixed capital for that business and he is certain that he can grow it, but what he likes the best is raise livestock such as cows, bulls, and goats.  He cares for them with much dedication and sells them to the butcher, who gives him the best price, whenever he has financial concerns.

He is a member of the “Pampa Blanca” communal bank and this will be his 11th loan through MFP, where he is happy because he has worked with his association for many years.  The other members are human and above all have a great desire to help one-another.  Cesar will use the money from this loan to buy compost for his next crop.

loans.use: to buy compost.

loans.name: Antonia

texts.es: Antonia, de 34 años; es una mujer amable. Vive en compañía de Alberto, su esposo desde hace 12 años. Ambos tienen 4 hijos a los que cuida en una casa alquilada, ubicada en la localidad de Pampa blanca.  Cuando el día comienza, Antonia, se levanta para recoger la leña con la que preparará sus alimentos, “me gusta preparar, de manera natural, pues las cocinas modernas no me gustan”, por ello recoge las ramas caídas de los árboles, en ocasiones aprovecha el paseo, para pastar a sus vacas, cuenta con 5 ejemplares todas ella de buena raza, pues una de la actividades que realiza en la compra y venta de las mismas. Pero como buena hija del campo, también siembra en terrenos alquilados, papa, maíz, quinua y alverja, los cuales cuida con mucha dedicación por las tardes. Cuenta que en temporadas de cosecha de papa, los frutos maduros los traslada a la capital del país donde encuentra buenos compradores. Pero las demás hortalizas las comercializa en la misma ciudad, pues ya tiene clientes fijos. En la actualidad tiene muchos proyectos, uno de ellos es construir su propia casa, y comenzar a juntar dinero para poder tener sus propios terrenos agrícolas. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “pampa blanca” y este es el crédito número 9 con MFP, donde se siente feliz, ya que tiene muchos años trabajando con su asociación, donde los integrantes son personas, humanas y sobre todo con muchas ganas de ayudarse entre ellos. Antonia, invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de guano de ave (abono orgánico), para su próxima siembra de maíz.
texts.en:
Antonia is 34 years old and a woman to be admired.  She lives with her husband of 12 years, Alberto.  They have four children and care for them in their rented home, located in Pampa Blanca.

When the day begins, Antonia goes out to gather firewood which she uses to cooks her food. “I like to prepare in a natural way because I don’t like modern kitchens.”  This is why she gathers fallen branches.  At times she takes advantage of the pastures to feed her cows of which she has 5 from good stock; she buys and sells them.  Like a good child of the fields, she also raises crops on rented land.  She grows potatoes, corn, quinine, and peas, and cares for them with dedication in the evenings

She says that during the potato harvesting season, she takes them to the nation’s capital where she can find good buyers and keeps the other vegetables to sell in her own town, where she has steady customers.

She has many plans at the moment.  One of them is to build a house of her own and begin saving money for her own farmland.  She is a member of the “Pampa Blanca” communal bank and this will be her 9th loan through MFP.  She is happy there and has been working with the association for many years.  The other members are very human and above all have a great desire to help one another.  Antonia will use the money from this loan to buy bird guano (fertilizer) for her next harvest.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer.

loans.name: Dorys Catalina

texts.es: Dorys Catalina a sus 44 años de edad, casada con dos hijos ambos mayores de edad uno de 21 y otro de 26 años, el de 26 ya no estudia sino que trabaja, la joven de 21 años estudia en 1er año de la universidad, la Sra. Dorys es propietaria de un negocio de venta de ropa usada, nueva, bisutería, zapatos, cosméticos y otros, su negocio está  ubicado en su domicilio en Chichigalpa donde predomina el ron, la azúcar, caña, el tabaco, la Sra. Se ha dedicado con su esposo a la venta de queso y abarrotería ambulante además de fritanga al ya no querer andar ambulante estableció este negocio de venta de ropa usada y demás productos ella tiene 11 años de tener este negocio,  en él ha ido prosperando  poco a poco, en la actualidad Dorys tiene mayor demanda por estar en periodo de fiestas de fin de año e inicio de zafra en el ingenio San Antonio mayor creador de trabajo en la zona lo que hace que la demanda aumente y necesite invertir más para surtir su negocio, por eso solicita financiamiento para incrementar su inventario.
texts.en: Dorys Catalina is 44 years old and married with two older sons who are 21 and 26 years old. The 26-year-old doesn´t study anymore, but instead works, and the 21-year-old is studying in his first year at the university. Dorys is the owner of a business that sells used clothing, cosmetics, imitation jewelry, shoes, and other things. Her business is located in her house in Chichigalpa where people premoninately sell rum, sugar, caña (an alcoholic beverage made from sugar cane) and tobacco.She and her herband have dedicated themselves to selling cheese and groceries in the streets as well as fried food. Once she didn´t want to walk through the streets selling products, she established her business for used clothing and other products. She has spent eleven years on this business and has prospered little be little. Now Dorys has a high demand because there is a period of parties for the end of the year and the beginning of the sugar harvesting season in San Antonio, the largest creator of work in the zone. This will create a larger demand, and she would need to invest more to stock her business. For this reason she is asking for financing to increase her inventory.

loans.use: to invest in the sale of used clothing, cosmetics, imitation jewelry, shoes, and other things.

loans.name: Jose Rudy Agapito

texts.es:
José, se decidió por un nuevo préstamo, porque necesita dinero para la recolección de la cosecha de granos básicos, pagara maquinaria para desgranar el maíz y tambien arrendara dos manzanas de terreno para la otra temporada de siembra.
Él considera que en su cultivo ha aumentado la producción y sus ingresos, que los utiliza para mantener a su familia; manifiesta que ha mejorado sus condiciones económicas y está muy bien de salud.
texts.en:
José has decided upon a new loan because he needs money to reap the harvest of basic grains. He will pay for machine milling to remove the kernels from the corn, and he will also rent two plots of land for the next planting season. 

He believes that with his crops he has increased his production and his income, which he will use to support his family. He reports that he has improved his economic condition, and he is in very good health.

loans.use: to rent agricultural land and to pay for machine milling of his corn.

loans.name: Jose Vidal

texts.es:
José, se ha decidido por un nuevo préstamo por la necesidad de invertir más en el negocio, se comprara abono para terminar de abonar la milpa que tiene en crecimiento, sería como un complemento para fortalecer la plantación, así tambien le aplicara insecticidas y pesticidas. 
El préstamo anterior le permitió crecer y tener lo necesario para trabajar, realzando su cultivo, a través de este trabajo logra tener en su familia las condiciones adecuadas y los ingresos necesarios.
texts.en:
José has decided upon a new loan due to the need to invest more in his business. He will buy fertilizer to finish fertilizing the rotating crops which are currently growing. This will serve as an added factor to strengthen his plantings, and he will also apply insecticides and pesticides. 

The previous loan permitted him to grow and have what he needed to work and cultivate his crops. Through this work he is able to maintain his family in adequate conditions and earn the income he needs.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, insecticides and pesticides.

loans.name: Carlos Andres

texts.es: Carlos de 34 años de edad, casado, tiene 3 hijos, vive en una aldea del municipio de Macuelizo Santa Bárbara con su familia. El trabajo varios años en una fabrica maquiladora y hace un año quedo sin empleo y junto a su esposa decidieron establecer su propio negocio. Tiene una pulpería donde vende productos de la canasta básica familiar como pan, refrescos, churros, dulces, arroz, maíz, frijoles, carnes, embutidos, pastas, harina, productos de limpieza, lácteos, productos enlatados, condimentos etc. actualmente ha decidido solicitar un préstamo por 8,000 lempiras para surtir el negocio de productos de abarrotería, carnes, lácteos, frijoles, maíz, refrescos, pastas y otros que le ayudara a incrementar las ventas y a obtener ganancias. Su meta es crecer en el negocio para sacar adelante a su familia y lograr que sus hijos sean profesionales.
texts.en:
Carlos, age 34, is married and has three children.  He lives with his family in the Macuelizo municipality in Santa Bárbara.  He worked for several years in a factory.  One year ago he was left without employment.  He and his wife decided to establish their own business.  They have a grocery store where they sell basic grocery items like bread, soft drinks, churros, sweets, rice, corn, beans, meat, sausages, pasta, flour, cleaning products, canned goods, and condiments, etc.

He has now decided to request a loan for 8,000 lempiras in order to stock his business with grocery products, meat, dairy products, beans, corn, soft drinks, and others.  This will help him increase sales and get income.  His goal is to grow in the business in order to get his family ahead and to see to it that his children become professionals.

loans.use: to buy food products like beans, corn, dairy products, soft drinks, pasta, and sausages in order to stock his grocery store and increase sales.

loans.name: Roberto Jose

texts.es: Roberto, 36 años de edad, originario de Estelí, es dueño de un taller de soldadura, es padre de un hijo de dos meses de nacido, su esposa es ama de casa. Él es quien sostiene a su familia por medio de su negocio. El aprendió este oficio a los 18 años de edad cuando era aprendiz en un taller de mecánica donde se dedica a soldar las piezas de carros poco a poco fue ahorrando para comprar sus herramientas y trabajar por su propia cuenta de esta manera fue que decidió poner su taller de soldadura y mecánica. Una  de sus expectativas es lograr contratar ayudantes para el negocio y ubicarlo a orillas de la carretera ya que considera un punto para ofrecer sus servicios. Está requiriendo el crédito para comprar laminas de zinc y cambiar el techo de su taller pues está deteriorado y viejo necesita mantener en buenas condiciones la infraestructura de su negocio para brindar un mejor servicio a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Roberto is 36 years old and is from Estelí. He is the owner of a soldering workshop, father of a two-month-old son, and has a wife who is a stay-at-home mom. He supports his family through the money he earns from his business. He learned this trade when he was 18 years old and was working as an apprentice at a mechanic's shop where he used to solder car parts. He gradually saved up to be able to buy his own tools and then started his soldering and mechanic business.

One of his hopes is to be able to hire employees to help him, and to move the business near to the freeway because he sees this as a good location from which to offer his services.

He is requesting the loan to buy sheet zinc to be able to replace the roof of his workshop because it is old and falling apart. He needs to maintain the infrastructure of his business in good condition to be able to offer his customers a good service.

loans.use: to buy sheet zinc to replace the roof of his soldering workshop.

loans.name: Luis Alberto

texts.es: Luis, tiene 39 años de edad, casado, tiene 4 hijos y vive en una comunidad que pertenece al municipio de la Masica, Atlántida. Luis lleva 8 años de dedicarse a la elaboración de muebles de madera como muebles de cocina, de comedor, closet, chineros y otros. Él le dedica todo el día a su negocio y cuida su clientela. Ha decidido solicitar un préstamo por 12,000 Lempiras para comprar materia prima como es la madera, comprara madera de diferentes clases. Con este préstamo el espera capitalizarse y continuar obteniendo mayores ganancias. Su meta es que sus hijos se gradúen y que el negocio siga creciendo.
texts.en:
Luis, age 39, is married and has four children.  He lives in a community in the Masica municipality in Atlántida.  Luis has been making wood furniture for eight years.  He makes things like kitchen furniture, dining room furniture, wardrobes, and china cabinets, among others.  He spends his entire day on his business, and he takes care of his customers.

He has decided to request a loan for 12,000 lempiras to buy raw material.  He will buy different types of wood.  With this loan he hopes to capitalize on his business and continue getting greater income.  His goal is for his children to graduate and that his business continues growing.

loans.use: to buy different types of wood to make furniture.

loans.name: Carlos Alberto

texts.es:
Carlos, tiene la necesidad de un préstamo, porque su vehículo necesita la reparación para mantenerse en buenas condiciones, invirtiendo en llantas, reparación de culata, y en todo el mantenimiento que considere  el mecánico para poderse transportar.
Con el préstamo anterior, ayudo a mejorar sus ingresos ya que se dedica a realizar viajes, por eso es su interés en tener en buenas condiciones el vehículo, pues de este dependen los ingresos para la familia, sus circunstancias en el hogar se han mantenido.
texts.en:
Carlos needs a loan because his vehicle needs repairs to keep it in good shape.  He will use the money to buy tires, repair the body, and do other maintenance that the mechanic feels it needs to be able to provide transportation.

He used the money from the previous loan to help increase his income since he provides trips.  He wants to keep his vehicle in good condition because the household depends on this income and his home circumstances have remained stable.

loans.use: to repair his vehicle.

loans.name: Edix Mercedes

texts.es:
Edix, se decidió por solicitar un nuevo préstamo porque quiere invertir en el negocio, comprándose productos de primera necesidad como maíz, frijoles, aceite, queso, huevos, entre otros productos que sean necesarios para aumentar el negocio.
Con el préstamo anterior le permitió  crecer y tener lo más necesario para atender a los clientes y en su familia tiene mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Edix decided to request another loan because she wants to invest in her business by buying staple items such as corn, beans, oil, cheese, eggs, and other products she needs to expand her business.

The previous loan allowed her to grow and have what she needed most to serve her customers and to have a better income for her family.

loans.use: to buy corn, beans, oil, cheese, and eggs

location.town: San Rafael de Oriente, San Miguel

loans.name: Raquel

texts.es:
